name: Pinakbet with Pork
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, pork and bagoong in oil. Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step2: Add kalabasa, okra and sitaw in 2-minute intervals. Add ampalaya and eggplant and simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chicken Nuggets
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, garlic powder and onion powder.
Step2: Coat well with flour, dip in beaten egg and coat well with bread crumbs. Set aside.
Step3: Pan fry chicken in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with dipping sauce.

name: Chicken Caldereta
ingredients: 2 pcs of Red And Green Chili
2 cubes of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Savor Classic and set aside.
Step2: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion and chili in the same pan. Add marinated chicken and 1pc of MAGGI® Chicken Cube and sauté for 2mins.
Step4: Add tomato, liver spread and tomato paste. Cook for 2mins.  Pour water and season with remaining 1pc of MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cubes, pepper, sugar, bay leaves. Simmer for 15mins.
Step5: Add bell peppers and sautéed potato and carrot. Simmer for another 5mins. Stir in coconut cream and cheese. Transfer on a serve plate and serve.

name: Instant Pansit Canton-style Kari
instructions: Step1: Boil 2 cups of water.  Add MAGGI® Kari noodles and cook while covered for 2mins.
Step2: Combine ½ packet of MAGGI® Kari seasoning powder, oil, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sugar on a serving plate
Step3: Strain noodles and immediately toss in the seasoning. Coat well, transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Pastel
ingredients: 2 cubes of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
1 packet of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, and onion in oil Add chicken and 1pc of MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube. Cook for 2mins.
Step2: Add carrot, mushroom and bell pepper. Cook for 5mins.
Step3: Pour water and simmer for 15mins. Season with remaining 1pc of MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube.
Step4: Stir in NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream, quail eggs and green peas. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Pancit Canton
ingredients: 1 cube of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and squid balls in oil.
Step2: Pour water and simmer.  Add MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.  Stir in noodles. Cover for 2mins. Toss well.
Step3: Add carrot, cabbage and shrimp. Cover and cook for 2mins. Toss well. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Pininyahang Manok
ingredients: 0.5 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic and onion in oil. Add chicken and 1pc MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube. Cook for 2mins.
Step2: Add bell peppers and pineapple chunks. Cook for 2mins.
Step3: Pour reserved syrup and water. Add remaining 1pc of MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube and pepper. Simmer for 15mins.
Step4: Stir in evaporated milk and simmer for another 2mins. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Chicken Adobong Puti
ingredients: 1 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
2 cubes of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Sauté chicken in oil until golden brown.
Step2: Add garlic, bay leaves, peppercorn and MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cubes. Cook for 5mins.
Step3: Pour vinegar and simmer for 2mins. Pour water and simmer for 15mins.
Step4: Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Adobong Pininyanhang Manok
ingredients: 1 cube of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken, MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, pepper, garlic, reserved syrup, sugar and water in a pot. Simmer for 15mins.
Step2: Strain chicken and garlic. Set aside. Reserve cooking liquid.
Step3: Sauté chicken, pineapple chunks and garlic in oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and simmer until slightly thick. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Ginataang Manok
ingredients: 1 cube of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in oil. Add chicken and cook for 2mins. Add bagoong and continue to cook for another 2mins.
Step2: Pour water and simmer for 10mins
Step3: Add chilies, coconut cream and MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube. Simmer for another 10mins. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Aligue Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Cook beaten egg in 1 tbsp of oil until barely set. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in oil. Add taba ng talangka. calamansi juice, shrimp and scrambled egg.
Step3: Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Pour 2 tbsp. of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Stir in spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chicken Pochero
ingredients: 2 cubes of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Sauté kamote and saging na saba in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in the same pan. Add chicken and 1pc MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube. Cook for 2mins.
Step3: Pour tomato sauce and water. Add bay leaf, sugar, garbanzos, sautéed kamote and remaining 1pc of MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube. Simmer for 15mins.
Step4: Add cabbage and sautéed saging na saba. Simmer for another 2mins. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Lugaw
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in oil. Stir in rice and pour water. Simmer for 30 minutes.

Step2: Season with MAGGI®  MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Stir in kasubha. Continue to simmer until rice is fully cooked. Adjust with water if necessary.aSeason with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in kasubha. Continue to simmer until rice is fully cooked. Adjust with water if necessary.
Step3: Transfer into serving bowls and top with chicharon, egg, toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve with calamansi.

name: All-in-One Torta de Patata
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and onion in olive oil in a non stick pan. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®  and pepper. Remove and set aside to cool.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add sautéed potato mixture.

Step3: Pour half of the mixture in the same pan, carefully stir and cook until barely set. Add garted cheese on top and pour remaining potato and egg mixture. Cook until barely set. Cover with plate, flip and return in the pan to cook the other side.
Step4: Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve warm.

name: Tom Yam with Shrimp and Coconut
ingredients: 80 g of MAGGI® Tom Yam Noodles
instructions: Step1: Cook MAGGI® Tom Yam on boiling water. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Add shrimp and mushroom. Stir in MAGGI® Coconut Powder mixture.
Step3: Transfer into a serving bowl, top with bean sprouts and cilantro.  Serve immediately.

name: Lumpiang Shanghai
ingredients: 1 pc of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Combine ground pork, onion, carrot, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and ½ sachet of MAGGI Magic Sarap®. Mix well. Assemble 1 – 1½ tbsp per lumpia wrapper.
Step2: Preheat oil and fry lumpia until golden brown. Transfer on cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: To prepare the dipping sauce, mix water with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, ½ sachet of MAGGI Magic Sarap®, garlic, chili, sugar and pepper. Bring to simmer.
Step4: Stir in cornstarch mixture to thicken the sauce. Transfer into a serving bowl. Serve with freshly cooked Lumpiang Shanghai.

name: Tuna Karibonara
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic and onion and tuna in a pan.
Step2: Pour water in the same pan. Add ½ packet of MAGGI® Kari seasoning powder. Bring to simmer and add noodles.
Step3: Stir in NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream and cheese. Transfer into a serving plate, top with parsley. Serve immediately

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: 2 g of SMART SOUP, Indian Bean Masala
1 packet of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Rinse basmati rice twice. Soak in water and set aside while preparing the rest of the ingredients.
Step2: Sauté cinnamon, bay leaves, star anise, cardamom, mace, dried chili, coriander seeds in a pot with oil for 1min. Add biryani masala and sauté for another minute.

Step3: Mix half of coriander and half of mint leaves with pepper, cloves, red chili, finger chili, garlic and ginger. Add to the pot with the spices and cook for 1min. Add onion and tomato and cook for another 2mins.
Step4: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and add in the pot to cook for 5mins.
Step5: Pour water. Combine NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream and vinegar. Stir in the pot and simmer.
Step6: Drain basmati rice add to the pot. Season with the remaining  1 ½ sachets of MAGGI Magic Sarap®. Gently stir, cover and cook over low heat for 30mins. Turn off heat and set aside for 15mins.
Step7: Fluff rice and transfer into a serving plate. Top with remaining coriander and mint leaves. Serve warm.

name: Linigid na Manok (Chicken Curry)
ingredients: 1 packet of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and set aside.
Step2: Sauté onion, garlic and turmeric in oil for 2mins. Add chicken and cook for 5mins.
Step3: Pour water and coconut milk. Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and peppercorn. Simmer for 20mins uncovered to reduce sauce.
Step4: Stir in NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream and chili tops. Transfer into as serving plate and serve.

name: Musubi-style Meat Loaf and Rice
instructions: Step1: Slice luncheon meat into 6 equal rounds. Sauté in oil until light golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Season cooked rice with MAGGI® Savor Classic and mirin. Mix well.
Step3: Carefully remove lid on other side of the can with a can opener making sure there are no sharp edges to create a make-shift mold. Wash and dry well.
Step4: To assemble, place sautéed luncheon meat at the bottom of the mold. Add rice and press tightly. Place another meatloaf. Press and release from the mold. Repeat the process.
Step5: Wrap with nori strip and serve with mayonnaise.

name: Fried Tokwa’t Baboy
ingredients: 1 pc of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water with garlic, bay leaf and peppercorn for 1 hour. Remove and set aside to cool completely.
Step2: Combine vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, chili and pepper. Set aside.
Step3: Cut pork into slices and coat with 2 tbsp soy souce. Preheat oil and fry pork until golden brown. Drain excess oil and cut into serving pieces.
Step4: Fry tofu in the same oil until golden brown. Drain excess oil and cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving plate and garnish with onion. Serve with dipping sauce.

name: Oriental Pork Estofado
instructions: Step1: Sauté saging na saba and carrot in 2 tbsp of oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in the same pan. Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and add to the pan. Cook for 5mins
Step3: Add vinegar, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and bay leaf. Stir and cook for another 3mins.
Step4: Pour water, cover and simmer for 45mins. Add water as needed.
Step5: Stir in sautéed carrot and saging na saba. Cook for 3mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in the same pan. Add chicken and cook for 5mins.
Step3: Add curry powder, pepper, bay leaf, potato and carrots. Pour water and simmer for 10mins
Step4: Add MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cubes and bell peppers. Stir in dissolved MAGGI® Coconut Powder and simmer for another 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pork Sisig
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water with bay leaves and peppercorn until tender. Drain and set aside to cool. Cut into thick slices and season with 1 sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Coat with 2 tbsp of oil. Grill until golden brown. Coarsely chop and set aside.
Step2: Season chicken liver with ½ sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Coat with 1 tbsp of oil and grill until golden brown. Coarsely chop and add to pork.
Step3: Simmer calf brain in water for 10 minutes (optional). Strain, coarsely chop and add to pork and liver.

Step4: Add garlic, onion and chili. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®, MAGGI Savor Classic, calamansi juice, sugar and pepper. Gently mix. Preheat a clean sizzling plate, add 1 cup of Sisig, mix and serve immediately.

name: Pinoy Spaghetti
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil. Add tomato sauce, catsup and hotdog. Pour water and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and brown sugar. Set aside.
Step2: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step3: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate, top with cheese and serve.

name: Yang Chow Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a wok and pour eggs. Stir and cook until barely set. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, carrot, chorizo and shrimp in oil. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and pepper.
Step3: Stir in rice, scrambled egg, lettuce, spring onion and sesame oil. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Pritong Bangus
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and fry in oil until golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Simmer garlic, ginger, onion, tomato, finger chili in water.
Step3: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang® Original Sampalok Mix and fish sauce.
Step5: Add fried bangus and kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Pesto Spaghetti
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Cook garlic and olive oil in a small pot until soft. Transfer in a blender. Add basil, cashew, lemon zest and juice. Season with salt, pepper, sugar and cheese. Purée until smooth. Set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and 1/8 tsp of pepper. Sauté chicken in oil until golden brown. Remove from the pan, coat with 2 tbsp of the pesto and set aside.
Step3: Add pesto in the same pan and cook for 2 minutes. Pour water and NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream. Simmer and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step4: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step5: Strain spaghetti, toss in the sauce and transfer on a serving plate. Cut chicken into serving pieces, place on top of pasta and serve.

name: One-Pan Egg Toast
instructions: Step1: Beat 3pcs of eggs with ¾ tsp of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Melt ½ tbsp of butter in a nonstick pan, swirl and pour beaten eggs. Place 2 pcs of white bread and cook over low heat for 1min.
Step3: Flip the egg to cook the other side. Fold the sides of the egg to fit inside the bread. Grate 1tbsp of cheese on one side of the egg and spread 1 tbsp of the mayonnaise on the other side.
Step4: Fold the bread to form the sandwich. Add another ½ tbsp of butter to toast the bread until golden brown.
Step5: Remove from the pan and set aside for 1min before slicing and serving. Repeat until 6 sandwiches are assembled and served.

name: Mixed Seafood with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Place mussels in a pan with ½ cup water. Cover and cook for 1 minute. Remove half of shell and set aside mussels. Reserve mussel liquid.
Step2: Boil salted water and add squid. Cook for 30 seconds. Strain and soak in cold water. Drain well and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, celery, bell peppers and shrimp in oil. Pour mussel liquid and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with pepper. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step4: Add mussels and squid. Cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with scallions and serve.

name: Inasal-Style Boneless Chicken
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®,  MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi, vinegar, lemongrass, ginger, garlic and pepper. Set aside.
Step2: Combine annatto seeds and oil in a pan. Gently heat for 3mins and strain.
Step3: Skewer chicken pieces and brush with annatto oil. Preheat a clean grill and cook for 2 – 3mins   per side.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Pork Caldereta
ingredients: 1 packet of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
3 pcs of small red chili, sliced
instructions: Step1: Season pork with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, bell peppers, chili, chorizo, tomato paste and liver spread in the same pan for 5 minutes.
Step3: Pour water, add pork, bay leaf and sugar. Simmer for 1 hour.
Step4: Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in coconut cream and cheese. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Scrambled Egg
instructions: Step1: Preheat oil in a pan.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Pour egg in the pan and continuously stir until barely set. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sweet and Spicy Beef Tapa
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
0.5 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, to taste
instructions: Step1: Marinate beef with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili, pepper, sugar and garlic. Set aside for 10mins.
Step2: Sauté beef in oil over high heat until golden brown.
Step3: Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Beef with Broccoli
instructions: Step1: Season beef with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® Sauté in 2 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside

Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in remaining oil. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®, sugar and pepper. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Add beef, mushroom, broccoli and quail eggs. Cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Fried Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step2: Coat chicken well with flour.
Step3: Pan fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Salmon Belly Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomatoes and siling panigang in oil. Pour water and simmer. Skim the scum.
Step2: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals. Add salmon belly and cook for 1 minute.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Stir in kangkong.  Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Tortang Talong
instructions: Step1: Pierce the eggplant with a fork and roast over open flame until skin is charred. Place in a bowl and cover. Set aside for 10 minutes. Peel the charred skin and flatten with a fork.
Step2: Season each eggplant with a pinch of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Beat an egg in a deep plate and season with a pinch of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Dip the eggplant in the beaten egg.
Step4: Fry eggplant with the egg until golden brown. Drain excess oil, transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinangag
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in oil until golden brown.
Step2: Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Pour 2 tbsp of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sarciadong Tilapia
instructions: Step1: Season tilapia with 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Pan fry in oil until golden brown. Drain and set aside in a plate.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion and tomato. Pour water and simmer.
Step3: Stir in beaten egg and season with 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.  Stir in scallions. Pour sauce on top of fried fish and serve.

name: Clubhouse Sandwich
instructions: Step1: Season chicken breast with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and paprika. Set aside.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a nonstick pan and pour beaten eggs. Cook until barely set. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Lightly sauté ham in 1 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.
Step4: Heat 2 tbsp of oil in the same pan. Sauté chicken for 2mins per side. Remove and set aside.
Step5: Lightly spread butter on white bread. Toast until light golden brown.
Step6: Slice chicken breast. Spread mayonnaise on toasted bread, assemble cheese, lettuce, tomato, ham, egg and chicken to make Clubhouse sandwich. Serve immediately.

name: Pork Barbeque
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and skewer with barbeque sticks.
Step2: Combine garlic, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce , catsup, sugar and chili.
Step3: Brush pork with oil and grill for 1 minute per side. Brush with the barbeque sauce and continue to grill until golden brown. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Adobong Pusit
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and finger chili in oil. (10 mins)
Step2: Add soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaf, pepper and water. Simmer uncovered for 45mins? or until squid is tender and sauce has slightly reduced.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Beef Caldereta
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown and set aside.
Step2: Season beef with 2 sachets 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté beef and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion and chili in oil in a pot. Add tomato paste and liver spread. Add sautéed beef. Barely cover with water and add bay leaves. Simmer until tender. Add water as needed.

Step4: Once tender, add sautéed potato, carrot and bell peppers. Season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in cheese, coconut cream and green peas. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tortang Talong at Sardinas
ingredients: 2 cans of Sardines in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and sardines with sauce in oil. Set aside.
Step2: Roast eggplant over open flame until charred. Set aside in a bowl with cover for 5mins. Peel and flatten. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Set aside.
Step3: Beat 1 egg, season lightly with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and place 1 pc of roasted eggplant.  Add ¼ of the sardines mixture on top of the eggplant. Fry for 2mins per side.
Step4: Remove torta and drain excess oil. Repeat to cook 4 pcs of Tortang Talong. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Beef Pares
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in oil in a pot. Add beef, five spice powder, pepper, sugar and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step2: Barely cover with water and simmer until tender. Skim off fat.
Step3: Add sesame oil. Transfer into a serving plate and garnish with spring onion and toasted garlic.

name: Creamy Chicken Sopas
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken breast in water for 10 minutes. Reserve broth and shred chicken.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in a pot. Pour reserved broth and simmer. Add macaroni and carrot and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour Nestlé® All Purpose Cream. Stir in cabbage. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Scrambled Egg with Sausage
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, bell pepper and chorizo in olive oil. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Pour beaten egg and gently stir until barely set.. Stir in parsley. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tortang Dulong
instructions: Step1: Season dulong with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix in beaten egg.

Step2: Preheat oil in a large pan. Carefully drop 2 spoonful of mixture. Fry until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Sarciadong Hotdog
instructions: Step1: Simmer hotdog in a pan with water. Add margarine and sauté for 2 minutes.
Step2: Add garlic and onion. Sauté until golden brown.
Step3: Pour catsup and water. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Transfer on a servings plate and serve.

name: Tortang Hotdog
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and hotdog in margarine in a nonstick pan. Pour water and cook until water has evaporated
Step2: Beat eggs and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour into the pan.

Step3: Gently stir and cook until barely set. Cover with a plate, flip and slide back to the pan to cook the other side. Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: All-in-One Tortang Giniling
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, pork, potato and carrot in oil. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.

Step3: Pour beaten egg, gently stir and cook until barely set. Cover with plate, flip and return to the pan to cook the other side.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Crispy Spicy Liempo
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Combine flour and cornstarch. Coat pork well with flour and cornstarch mixture and set aside.
Step2: Fry pork in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.

Step3: Remove oil from the pan. Add sesame oil, garlic and siling labuyo. Sauté for 30 seconds. Add fried pork and spring onion. Toss until pork is well coated.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, coat with flour and fry until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step2: Remove oil from the wok leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic and onion. Pour water and season wit remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Simmer and stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Add carrots, snow peas, young corn and cabbage. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Hotdog Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, carrot and hotdog in oil.
Step2: Push on the side and pour beaten eggs. Stir and cook until barely set.
Step3: Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour 2 tbsp of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Stir in cabbage.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve

name: Ham and Cheese Omelette
instructions: Step1: Sauté ham in 1 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Drizzle 1 tbsp oil in a large non stick pan and pour beaten eggs. Stir and cook until barely set.
Step3: Add ham and grated cheese on one side of the egg. Carefully slide on a plate and fold. Serve warm.

name: Rellenong Alimasag
instructions: Step1: Simmer crabs in a little water to pan steam for 5mins. Set aside to cool. Pick out the meat and the crab fat and set aside. Reserve shells.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in oil. Remove from the pan and set aside to cool. Combine with ground pork, crab meat and crab fat. Stir in eggs and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Coat the inside of crab shells with a little flour and stuff with the crab meat mixture. Pan fry in oil until golden brown. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Fried Tilapia
instructions: Step1: Season tilapia with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry tilapia for 4 – 5 minutes per side. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Chicken Broccoli
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté in 2 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.

Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in remaining oil. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Add  chicken, mushroom and broccoli. Cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Scrambled Egg with Shrimp
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper and shrimp in butter. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.

Step3: Pour beaten egg and gently stir until barely set. Stir in parsley. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

.

name: Sinigang na Pata with Gabi
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork, onion, tomato, gabi and siling panigang in water until tender. Mash gabi to thicken the soup.
Step2: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-min intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi, fish sauce and brown sugar. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Saucy Adobong Sitaw
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, shallots and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add vinegar and pepper. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar and water. Simmer for 2 minutes.
Step3: Stir in sitaw and cook for  5 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Salmon Head Sinigang with MAGGI® Magic Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomatoes and finger chili in oil.
Step2: Add salmon head. Pour water and simmer. Skim the scum.
Step3: Add radish. Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Sausage and Eggplant Frittata
instructions: Step1: Sauté sausage, garlic, onion and tomato in oil. Add eggplant and season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour egg in the pan and add parsley. Gently stir until barely set.
Step3: Cover with plate, flip and slide back in the pan to cook the other side. Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve warm.

name: Minced Pork with Eggplant
instructions: Step1: Fry eggplant in oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil  from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté pook, garlic, onion, tomato and chili. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with pepper.
Step3: Transfer fried eggplant in a plate and pour sauce on top. Garnish with spring onion and serve.

name: Fish and Shrimp Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté shrimp heads in oil. Crush heads to extract more of its flavor. Add garlic, ginger, onion and tomatoes. Pour water and simmer for 10mins. Strain broth into another pot. Bring to a boil.
Step2: Add siling panigang, radish, okra and sitaw with 2mins. intervals.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix, fish sauce and sugar.
Step4: Stir in shrimp, tanigue and kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Binagoongang Lechon Kawali sa Gata
ingredients: 1 pc of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water with garlic, bay leaf and peppercorn until tender. Strain and set aside. Reserve 1 cup of pork stock.
Step2: Fry pork belly until golden brown. Set aside to cool. Cut into serving pieces.

Step3: Remove oil from the pot leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, chilies and bagoong. Add pork and cook for 2mins. Pour vinegar. Stir in reserved pork stock and simmer until slightly thick.
Step4: Pour coconut cream and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Simmer for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Crab and Corn Soup
instructions: Step1: Combine water and corn in a pot. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Add shredded crab stick. Slowly pour cornstarch and water mixture while stirring to thicken the soup.
Step3: Beat egg and slowly pour to soup while gently stirring to create strands of egg. Stir in spring onion and sesame oil. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve hot.

name: Adobong Kangkong
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, shallots and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add vinegar and pepper. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar and water. Simmer for 2 minutes.
Step3: Stir in kangkong and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Easy Chicken Binacol
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, lemongrass and siling panigang in oil. Add chicken and cook for 5mins.
Step2: Pour coconut water, water and coconut meat. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in chili tops. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Ampalaya with Giniling
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add ampalaya and sauté for 5 minutes. Stir in beaten egg and cook until barely set.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pour water. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Corned Beef Lasagna
ingredients: 250 ml of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and corned beef in oil. Pour tomato sauce and water. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and sugar.
Step2: Pour a ladleful of the sauce in a baking pan and place a layer of lasagna sheets. Assemble the rest of the sauce and lasagna sheets.
Step3: Drizzle NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and top with grated cheese. Cover with foil and bake in a 350°F oven according to manufacturer’s instruction.
Step4: Remove aluminum foil and broil until top is golden brown. Set aside to rest for 10mins. Cut into serving portions, Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Ginataang Sitaw Kalabasa, at Hipon
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, finger chili in oil.
Step2: Pour water, add kalabasa and simmer while covered for 10 minutes. Add sitaw, then simmer for another 2 minutes.
Step3: Add coconut cream and shrimp. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pangat na Isda
instructions: Step1: Season sapsap with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Place onion, tomato, kamias, finger chili, peppercorn and sapsap alternately in wide pot.
Step3: Pour water, cover and simmer for 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pork Hamonado
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sear pork in 1 tbsp of oil in a pot.  Pour pineapple juice, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and reserved pineapple liquid. Add sugar and pepper. Pour water to barely cover the pork. Simmer for 1 ½ hrs or until tender. Skim off the fat.
Step2: Remove pork and set aside to cool. Cut pork into thick slices.
Step3: Preheat remaining oil in another pan and sauté pork and pineapple. Pour the sauce and simmer for another 20 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate, pour the sauce on top and serve.

name: Buttered Fish Fillet
instructions: Step1: Season fish fillet with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper.
Step2: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown. Strain and reserve toasted garlic for garnish.
Step3: Sauté fish in garlic butter. Add MAGGI Soy and calamansi juice. Cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate, garnish with toasted garlic and serve.?

name: Chicken Parmigiana
instructions: Step1: Combine bread crumbs and parsley. Season chicken breast with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Coat with flour, dip in beaten egg and coat with bread crumb mixture. Set aside.
Step2: Fry chicken in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step3: Preheat oven or toaster. Place slices of tomato and pesto on top of the chicken. Top with parmesan and mozzarella. Broil until cheese is golden brown. Cut into serving pieces and serve.

name: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Step1: Sauté bacon until golden brown and crispy. Strain Bacon and set aside for topping.
Step2: Add butter and annatto seed in the same pan. Gently heat for 2mins. Strain and discard annatto seeds.
Step3: Add flour in the same pan with the butter. Whisk in water, NESTLE® Carnation® Evap and cheese. Simmer until thick. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Boil pasta according to package direction. Drain and mix with the cheese sauce. Transfer on a serving plate, topped with bacon bits and serve.

name: Ginataang Puso ng Saging
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, siling panigang, pork belly and bagoong in oil. Pour vinegar and simmer for 2mins.
Step2: Add banana heart and water. Simmer until tender.
Step3: Pour coconut cream and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Halabos na Hipon
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Sauté garlic and ginger in oil. Add shrimp, cover and pan steam for 2 minutes.
Step3: Mix well. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.

Step2: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and of pepper. Sauté chicken in butter. Add garlic and onion. Pour NESTLE® Carnation® Evap, NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and water. Stir in cheese and simmer. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and nutmeg.
Step3: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce and parsley. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Cream and Cheese Spaghetti
ingredients: 1 packet of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step2: Sauté bacon in a large pan until crispy. Strain and set aside. Melt butter in the same pan with bacon fat. Add onion and mushroom.
Step3: Pour water and  NESTLE® All Purpose Cream. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in 2tbsp of cheese and half of the bacon bits. Drain pasta and immediately toss in the sauce.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and garnish with remaining cheese and bacon bits.

name: Ginataang Sigarilyas
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add sigarilyas and coconut milk. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add shrimp and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sour Prawn Soup
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté shrimp heads in oil. Crush heads to extract more of its flavor. Pour water and simmer for 10mins. Strain broth into another pot. Bring to a boil.
Step2: Add onion, tomato and siling panigang and simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix and season with fish sauce and sugar.
Step4: Add prawns. Stir in bean sprouts and transfer into a serving bowl. Garnish with scallions, cilantro and Thai basil. Serve immediately.

name: Classic Chicken Adobo
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken, MAGGI® Magic Chicken Cube, soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorn, garlic and water in a pot. Simmer for 15mins.
Step2: Strain chicken and garlic. Set aside. Reserve cooking liquid.?
Step3: Sauté chicken and garlic in oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and simmer until slightly thick. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Magical Chicken Afritada
ingredients: 10 g of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in the same pan. Add chicken and sauté for 2 mins.
Step3: Add MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cubes, pepper, sugar, bay leaf, tomato sauce and water. Stir and simmer for 15 minutes.
Step4: Add bell peppers and sautéed potato and carrot. Simmer for another 5 minutes. Transfer on a serve plate and serve.

name: Easy Bagoong Rice
instructions: Step1: Cook beaten egg in 1 tbsp of oil until barely set. Remove and set aside. Cut into pieces.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and bagoong in oil.
Step3: Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour 2 tbsp of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Transfer on a serving plate, top with egg and green mango and serve.

name: Chopsuey with Liver
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper and liver in oil for 2 minutes.
Step2: Pour water and simmer. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce.
Step3: Stir in cauliflower, carrots, sayote, green beans and cabbage with 1 minute intervals. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Creamy and Cheesy Kari Ramen?
ingredients: 5 pcs of shrimp, peeled and deveined?
2 tbsp of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with ¼ tsp of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté with oil in a pot for 1min. Remove and set aside for topping.

Step2: Boil water in the same pot Add MAGGI® Kari noodles and seasoning powder. Season with remaining ¼ tsp of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream, garlic and cheese. Pour into a serving bowl. ?
Step3: Top with shrimp, corn, cabbage, carrot and scallion. Serve immediately.?

name: Savorventure Grilled Salmon Belly Skewers
instructions:
Step1: Marinate salmon belly with MAGGI® Savor Calamansi, garlic, ginger and pepper. Set aside
for 10 minutes.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill and brush with oil. Skewer salmon belly strips.

Step3: Grill salmon skewers over high heat for 2 minutes per side. Transfer into a serving plate
and serve immediately with atchara.

name: Chicken Tinola
ingredients: 10 g of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and finger chili in oil. Add chicken and cook for 2mins.
Step2: Pour water, bring to a boil, skim the scum and simmer for 15 minutes.
Step3: Add MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cubes. Add sayote and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Step4: Stir in malunggay leaves. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Salad Sandwich
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water until cooked. Strain and shred chicken.
Step2: Combine shredded chicken with mayonnaise, pickle relish and onion. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Place in the refrigerator for 1hour.
Step3: Toast bread until light golden brown. Assemble sandwich of lettuce and chicken salad. Transfer on serving plate and serve.

name: Longganisa Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté longganisa in oil until golden brown.
Step2: Push on the side and sauté garlic, onion and tomato. Push on the side and pour egg. Stir and cook until barely set.
Step3: Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour 2tbsp of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Stir in spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Daing na Bangus
instructions: Step1: Marinate bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, vinegar, garlic and pepper for 10mins.
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry bangus for 4 minutes per side. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Tantanmen-style Kari Ramen?
ingredients: 1 stalk of spring onion, cut into 1-inch pieces?
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ginger in oil. ?
Step2: Pour water in the same pan. Stir in MAGGI® Kari seasoning powder, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, peanut butter and sugar.  Bring to simmer.?
Step3: Add noodles, cover and cook for 2mins. Add spring onion and peanuts. ?
Step4: Transfer into a serving plate and serve immediately.?

name: Oystar Stir Fried Mushrooms
ingredients: 1 pc of small red bell pepper, cut into 4 lengthwise
instructions: Step1: Sauté mushrooms separately in vegetable oil until golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic in remaining oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Add onion, ginger and bell pepper in the same pan. Cook for 2 minutes. Pour water and simmer. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, sugar and sesame oil. Simmer for 2 minutes.
Step4: Add sautéed mushrooms and half of the spring onion. Cook for 2 minutes.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate. Top with toasted garlic, remaining spring onion and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

name: Magical Chopsuey with Pork
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper and pork in oil for 2 minutes.
Step2: Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®
Step3: Stir in cauliflower, carrots, sayote, Baguio beans, sitsaro and cabbage with 1 minute intervals. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Oystar Salmon Teriyaki
instructions:
Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in oil. Add mirin, sugar, water, MAGGI Oyster Sauce and
sesame oil. Simmer until slightly thick. Strain and set aside.

Step2: Season fish with ½ sachet MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat half of the teriyaki sauce.
Marinate for 1 hour.
Step3: Preheat a clean grill and brush with oil. Grill salmon for 2 minutes per side.

Step4: Transfer salmon on a serving plate. Pour sauce on top and garnish with spring onion and
sesame seeds. (2mins)

name: Bicol Express
instructions: Step 1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, pork and bagoong.
Step 2: Pour coconut milk and simmer until pork is tender.
Step 3: Add finger chili and cook for another 10 minutes. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Breakfast Pork and Egg Burrito
ingredients: 1 pc of Small green bell pepper
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with 1 ½ tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and bell pepper in oil. Add marinated pork. Cook for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add rice and cook for another 2 minutes. Season with remaining 1 ½ tbsp of MAGGI Savor Chilimansi. Remove and set aside to cook. Divide into 3 portions.

Step4: Beat eggs and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Preheat a wide non stick pan. Drizzle 1 tsp of oil and pour beaten egg. Swirl the pan to cover evenly of the beaten egg. Cook for 1 minute per side. Remove and set aside. Repeat to make total of 3 egg wrappers. This will serve as a wrapper for the burrito.
Step5: Wrap 1 portion of the chicken and rice mixture with the egg wrapper. Repeat to make 3 burritos. Cut in half, transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Savorventure Teriyaki-Style Tofu
ingredients: 1 pc of small red bell pepper, cut into 4 lengthwise
instructions: Step1: Mix garlic, ginger, MAGGI® Savor Classic, sugar, sesame oil, cornstarch and water in a sauce pan. Gently simmer for 1 minute. Set aside.
Step2: Season tofu with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat lightly with oil. Grill for 1 minute per side. Brush lightly with the sauce and continue to grill for another minute.
Step3: Transfer on a serving plate and pour the rest of the sauce. Top with sesame seeds, bell pepper and scallion. Serve immediately.

name: Tortang Talong Meatballs
instructions: Step1: Pierce eggplant with a fork and roast over open flame until charred. Set aside in a bowl and cover. Once cooled, peel off charred skin and coarsely chop.
Step2: Combine eggplant, ground pork, onion, garlic and spring onion. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well and form into meatballs.
Step3: Pan fry meatballs in oil until golden brown. Serve immediately.

name: Fried Galunggong
instructions: Step1: Season galunggong with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry galunggong for 4mins per side. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Adobo Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Combine pork, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and water in a pot. Cover and simmer for 30mins. Strain pork and set aside.
Step2: Sauté pork in 1tbsp of oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and simmer for 5 minutes. Set aside to cool.
Step3: Strain pork and shred. Sauté in 1 tbsp of oil until crispy.

Step4: Sauté rice in remaining 1tbsp of oil. Pour cooking liquid from adobo and toss well. Transfer on a serving plate and top with Adobo flakes. Top with toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Fried Bangus
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry bangus for 5mins. per side. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Pork Asado
instructions: Step1: Combine pork, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar, cooking wine and garlic in a small pot. Pour water to barely cover the pork. Simmer for 1½ hours. Remove pork and set aside.
Step2: Simmer cooking liquid until slightly thick and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Slice pork and transfer into a serving plate. Pour sauce on top and serve.

name: Special Chopsuey
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and bell pepper in oil.
Step2: Pour water, simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Pour cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce.
Step3: Add vegetables and quail egg. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pork Estofado
instructions: Step1: Sauté carrot and saging na saba in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in the same pan. Add pork and cook for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add vinegar, MAGGI Supreme Sarap and bay leaf. Stir and cook for another 5 minutes.
Step4: Pour water and simmer for 45 minutes. Add water as needed.
Step5: Stir in sautéed carrot and saging na saba. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tokwa Meatballs
instructions: Step1: Mix tokwa, beansprouts, ground pork, egg and MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Form into 1 tbsp meatballs.
Step2: Fry meatballs in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Remove oil leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, carrot and string beans in the same pan. Pour water and MAGGI Supreme Sarap.
Step4: Add back fried meatballs and simmer for 5 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Magical Sizzling Pork Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork with onion, tomato, finger chili  and MAGGI MAGIC Sinigang with Gabi in water for 45 minutes. Strain and reserve and broth to make the sauce.
Step2: Once pork has cooled completely, season with 1 tsp of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Add flour and cook for 2 minutes over low heat. Stir in reserved broth to make sauce. Season with 1 tsp of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Set aside.
Step4: Sauté shallots and tomato in 2 tbsp of oil. Add radish, okra and sitaw. Season with remaining 1 tsp of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Step5: To serve, place pork on a preheated sizzling plate. Add sautéed vegetables on the side. Pour sauce and serve immediately.

name: Mapo Tofu
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and chili paste in oil.
Step2: Add ground pork and cook for 10 minutes.
Step3: Add water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, tofu and sesame oil. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate, top with scallion and serve.

name: Savorventure Honey-Garlic Tofu
ingredients: 0.25 cup of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Fry sliced tofu in preheated oil until golden brown. Strain a set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan and add butter. Add garlic and sauté until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.

Step3: Add red chili and cook for 1 minute. Pour honey, MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili, sesame oil and water. Simmer for 2 minutes and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add fried tofu and cook for another 2 minutes.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate, top with toasted garlic, scallion and sesame seeds.

name: Inihaw na Pla-pla
instructions: Step1: Create several slits on the flesh of the pla-pla. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi. Set aside.
Step2: Mix garlic, onion and tomato. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stuff the pla-pla with the tomato mixture.
Step3: Wrap the tilapia in 3 layers of banana leaf. Grill over medium high heat for 10mins per side. Set aside for another 10mins. Serve warm.

name: Creamy Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with 2 sachets of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, potato, carrot, and chicken in oil.
Step3: Add bell peppers, curry powder, pepper, and bay leaf. Pour water and simmer for 15 minutes.
Step4: Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and stir in NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tortang Hotdog Bites
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and hotdog with 2 tbsp margarine in a pan.
Step2: Pour water and cook until water has evaporated. Transfer into a bowl and set aside for 5 minute
Step3: Break eggs and pour in the hotdog mixture. Season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and mix well.

Step4: Brush a non stick muffin pan with remaining 2 tbsp of margarine. Pour egg mixture ¾ of the way and bake in an oven toaster for 10 minutes or until eggs are just set. Set aside for 5 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Savorventure Chicken Sisig
instructions: Step1: Season chicken and liver (optional) separately with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Coat with oil and grill until golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Coarsely chop chicken and liver. Add garlic, onion, red chili, green finger chili, MAGGI® Savor, calamansi juice, and pepper. Mix well.
Step3: Preheat a sizzling plate. Add sisig, garnish with toasted garlic and spring onion and serve immediately.

name: Savorventure Chicken Salpicao
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi.
Step2: Sauté garlic in olive oil until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté chicken for 5 minutes. Stir in half of the toasted garlic.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate, top with remaining toasted garlic and parsley. Serve warm.

name: Garlic & Butter Fried Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken wings with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and pepper.
Step2: Coat well with flour. Pan fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step3: Sauté garlic in butter. Add fried chicken and coat with the garlic and butter. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pansit Canton with Litsong Baka
ingredients: 1 container of store-bought Litson Baka, sliced
instructions: Step1: Sauté beef in oil in a wok for 2 minutes. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in the same wok.
Step3: Pour water and bring to simmer. Season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®, MAGGI Supreme Sarap and pepper.
Step4: Stir in pansit canton, carrot and cabbage. Cook for 2 minutes while stirring. Transfer on a serving plate, top with beef and serve immediately with calamansi.

name: Pork Igado
instructions: Step1: Sauté pork liver in 1 tbsp of oil for 2 minutes. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Pour remaining oil in the same pan and sauté garlic and onion. Add pork and cook for 2 minutes. Pour vinegar. Add soy sauce, finger chili, bay leaf and water. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.
Step3: Add green peas, bell pepper and sautéed liver. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Simmer for another 2 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chicken Sotanghon Guisado
ingredients: 2 tbsp of Canola And Corn Oil
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water for 10 minutes. Set aside the chicken and reserve the broth.
Step2: Combine oil and annatto seeds and heat for 5 minutes. Strain. Sauté garlic and onion in annatto oil.
Step3: Pour  broth and simmer. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Add sotanghon and cook for 5 minutes.
Step4: Add carrots, cabbage and chicken. Cook fry for another minute. Transfer on and serving platter and garnish with toasted garlic. Serve with calamansi.

name: All-in-One Tortang Hotdog
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic and onion in margarine using a non-stick pan.
Step2: Add hotdog and water. Cook until water has evaporated. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pour eggs.

Step3: Gently stir and cook over medium heat until barely set. Cover with a plate, flip and slide back to the pan to cook the other side for another minute. Remove from the pan and rest for 5 minutes and cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Magic All-In-One Torta
instructions: Step1: In a bowl combine pork, potatoes, carrots, red bell pepper and MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Mix until fully incorporated.
Step2: Add eggs to bind and divide mixture into 2. Heat cooking oil.
Step3: Fry ½ of the mixture into a big size patty similar to a small pizza then repeat the same with the other half or fry the mixture into smaller pieces similar to the size of burger patty.

name: Bibimbap
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Heat sesame oil. Stir in garlic and onion. Cooked until fragrant. Add ground beef, continue cooking until beef changes in color.
Step2: Add shrimp and cook until shrimp turns pink. Stir in carrots, cucumber, cabbage, mushroom and bean sprouts giving at least 30 seconds interval between each addition.
Step3: In a separate bowl, combine chili paste, MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, MAGGI® Savor, sugar and sesame oil. Mix well to incorporate.
Step4: Pour in prepared sauce into the beef and vegetable mixture. Remove from heat.
Step5: To assemble, place cooked rice in a bowl. Arrange cooked mixture and fried egg on top of rice. Serve hot.

name: Samgyupsal
instructions: Step1: Marinate the samgyupsal with the combined rest of the ingredients.
Step2: Leave it to the marinate for 1 hour or until ready to grill. Cook grilled in charcoal or pan-fry until golden brown.

name: Buttered Chicken
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with 1 sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Sauté in 2 tbsp of butter. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Add remaining 2 tbsp of butter in the same pan and sauté garlic, onion, tomato, and cashews. Add curry powder and chili powder. Cook for 5 minutes.
Step3: Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes. Transfer into a blender and purée until smooth. Pour back sauce into the same pan.
Step4: Add chicken and season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and sugar. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Step5: Stir in NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream. Transfer into a serving bowl, top with cilantro, and serve.

name: Pancit Sisig
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water with bay leaf. Remove and set aside to cool completely. Reserve 3 cups of broth. Slice pork, coat with oil and grill until crunchy.
Step2: Coat chicken liver with oil and grill for 1 minute per side.
Step3: Coarsely chop pork and liver. Combine with garlic, red onion, chili, MAGGI Soy, calamansi juice, sugar, and pepper. Gently mix and set aside.
Step4: Saute garlic, onion in oil. Pour broth and season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and MAGGI Soy.
Step5: Stir in noodles, carrot and cabbage. Transfer into a serving plate, top with sisig and spring onion and serve with calamansi.

name: Savorventure Quick Sisig Rice with Crispy Egg
instructions: Step1: Fry egg in vegetable oil until edges are crispy. Set aside.
Step2: Remove excess oil for the pan leaving 1 tbsp. Sauté garlic until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté sisig in the same pan for 2 minutes. Stir in red onion, remove from the pan and set aside.
Step4: Add rice in the same pan. Gently fluff for 2 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and drizzle MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi.
Step5: Place sisig on top of rice. Top with fried egg, drizzle mayonnaise, top with toasted garlic and scallion. Serve with MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi on the side

name: Korean Chicken Barbecue with Bean Sprouts
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken in MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sesame oil and chili sauce for at least 30 minutes.
Step2: Stir-fry prepared chicken until it changes in color. Remove from heat and set aside.
Step3: Heat cooking oil. Stir-fry bean sprout for 2 minutes. Season with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.
Step4: Pour in water and bring to a quick boil. Remove from heat and serve on the side of the prepared chicken barbecue. Serve immediately.

name: Sinigang na Tinapang Bangus
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Heat oil in a large pan. Pan fry tinapang bangus until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Set aside.
Step2: Combine garlic, ginger, onion, tomato, finger chili and water in a pot. Bring to a boil and simmer while covered for 10 minutes.
Step3: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI MAGIC Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix, fish sauce and sugar. Add tinapang bangus and simmer for 2 minutes.
Step5: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Pinaputok na Tilapia
instructions: Step1: Season tilapia with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Combine MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, onion, tomato, garlic and ginger. Mix well and stuff the tilapia with the tomato mixture.
Step3: Brush banana leaf with vegetable oil and place tilapia on top. Wrap tilapia with banana leaf. Wrap and seal tightly with aluminum foil.
Step4: Grill for 10mins per side. Remove from aluminum foil, transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Callos
instructions: Step1: Simmer calf’s feet in water until very tender. Add water as needed. Strain and set aside to cool. Remove bones and cut skin and collagen (litid) into small pieces. Reserve 6 cups of stock for sauce.
Step2: Meanwhile, simmer ox tripe in a separate pot until tender. Strain and discard liquid.

Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, chorizo, tomato paste and bay leaf in olive oil. Pour 6 cups of reserved stock and simmer. Add calf’s feet, ox tripe, olives, bell peppers and chickpeas. Simmer for another 30mins.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and sugar. Add parsley. Transfer into a serving bowl.

name: Dinardaraan
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork cheeks with bay leaf in water for 1hr. Strain pork and reserve 4 cups of broth.
Step2: Simmer pork intestine separately in water until tender. Drain and discard cooking liquid.
Step3: Cut pork cheeks and intestine into bite-size pieces and set aside.
Step4: Mix ¼ cup of sukang Iloko into the pork blood. Set aside

Step5: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and finger chili in oil. Add pork cheeks, pork intestine and remaining ¼
cup of vinegar.. Cook for 5mins. Pour pork broth and simmer until pork is tender.

Step6: Stir in pork blood and vinegar mixture. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Simmer for
another 10mins. Transfer on a serving bowl and serve.

name: Korean Beef Stew
ingredients: 3 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Tenderize beef with onion and ¼ cup MAGGI® Oyster Sauce in water. If using a pressure cooker, cook 40 minutes after the pressure cooker started to whistle.  If not, tenderize beef over low heat for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Adding more water if necessary.
Step2: When beef is tender and sauce is reduced, season with sweet chili sauce,
Step3: Top with spring onion and sesame seeds before serving. Serve with sautéed bean sprout on the side.

name: Pork Nilaga
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water for 45 minutes.
Step2: Add onion, garlic, bay leaf, peppercorn and potato and simmer for another 15 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Stir in pechay, cabbage and spring onion. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Oystar Steamed Fish with Oyster sauce
instructions: Step1: Coat fish with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, soy sauce and calamansi juice.
Step2: Scatter ginger, onion and garlic in a plate.  Place marinated fish on top and steam for about 20 - 25 minutes. Remove and set aside. Reserve liquid accumulated on the plate.
Step3: Combine MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, water, sugar and liquid in a small pan and bring to simmer. Pour on top of the fish, garnish with scallions and serve.

name: Calderetang Manok
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato in 1 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with 1 sachet of  MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Sauté until golden brown and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, chili, bell peppers, tomato paste and liver spread in a pot. Pour water, add chicken and bay leaf. Simmer  for 30 minutes.
Step4: Add potato and coconut cream. Season with remaining sachet of  MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, sugar and pepper. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pork Steak in Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in oil until golden brown. Strain garlic leaving oil in the pan.
Step2: Season pork with 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Sauté in oil until golden brown and set aside.
Step3: Sauté onion and mushroom in the same pan. Add flour and cook for 1 minute. Stir in water and soy sauce.
Step4: Add pork and simmer for 2 minutes. Pour Nestlé All Purpose Cream. Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with parsley and toasted garlic and serve.

name: Ginisang Monggo with Liempo
instructions: Step1: Simmer munggo in water while covered until tender.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, pork belly and hibe in oil. Add to simmering munggo.
Step3: Season with MAGGI MAGIC Pork®. Stir in chili tops. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Hearty Pancit Molo
instructions: Step1: Mix pork, shrimp, onion, carrot and singkamas. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Assemble in molo wrappers and seal with beaten egg.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, celery and ham in oil. Pour water and simmer. Season with  MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.
Step3: Drop dumplings one at a time and simmer for 5minutes. Transfer into a serving bowl and garnish with spring onion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Laing Pesto Pasta
ingredients: 3 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Sauté pork, ginger, onion, garlic, shrimp paste and chili in oil. Add gabi leaves, coconut milk and cream. Simmer until tender. Add shrimp and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.
Step2: Season prawns with ½ sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Coat with oil and grill until cooked.
Step3: Boil pasta according to package direction. Strain pasta and toss in the sauce.

Step4: Transfer on a  serving plate, top with grilled prawns and serve.


Note:
Shrimp and prawns may be replaced with any preferred fish fillet.

name: Pork Adobo with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Combine pork, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and water in a pot. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.
Step2: Heat oil in a separate pan, strain pork and sauté until golden brown.
Step3: Pour cooking liquid and simmer for 5 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Bistek-Style Pork Steak
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion in oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Season pork with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Sauté in oil and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic in the same pan. Add pork, soy sauce, pepper sugar and water. Cover and simmer until tender.
Step4: Stir in calamansi juice and simmer uncovered for another 10 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate and garnish with sautéed onion.

name: Ginisang Munggo with Hibe
ingredients: 10 g of MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube
instructions: Step1: Simmer munggo in water for 30mins
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and hibe in oil. Add to simmering munggo. Simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Chicken™? Cube. Stir in malunggay leaves. Transfer on serving bowl and serve.

name: Adobong Kangkong Recipe
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add vinegar and cook for 2mins.  Pour water and add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Bring to a simmer.
Step3: Stir in kangkong and cook for 2mins. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Oystar Pork Tonkatsu
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat well with flour, dip in beaten egg and coat well with bread crumbs. Set aside.
Step2: Pan fry pork in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step3: Combine MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, catsup, sweet chili sauce, sugar and water in a small pan. Simmer for 2 minutes and transfer into serving bowl.
Step4: Cut pork into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve with dipping sauce.

name: Tunasilog
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown.  Strain and set aside for topping.
Step2: Add tuna in the same pan and cook for 2mins. Stir in onion and season with 2tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Calamansi. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Add rice in the same pan. Season with remaining 1tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Calamansi and ¾ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into serving plates and top with sautéed tuna.
Step4: Fry eggs in vegetable oil until crispy. Season remaining ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® Place on top of the rice.
Step5: Top with scallion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Tinapa at Kesong Puti Omelet
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and tinapa in 1tbsp of oil. Add spring onion. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Remove from the pan and set aside to cool.

Step2: Beat 2pcs of eggs in a bowl and season with ¼ tsp of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Preheat and nonstick pan and add a little oil. Pour beaten eggs, stir until barely set and spread throughout the bottom of the pan.
Step3: Add 2tbsp of the tinapa mixture and kesong puti on one side of the egg. Carefully slide on a plate and fold. Cook the rest of the ingredients. Serve warm.

name: Supreme Pork Mechado
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Add pork in the same pan. Season with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sauté until light golden brown. Add garlic, onion and tomatoes. Cook for 10mins.
Step3: Add water, bay leaf and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Cover and simmer for 45mins.
Step4: Add sautéed potato, carrot and bell peppers. Simmer for another 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Salted Egg Spaghetti Recipe
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, siling labuyo and salted egg yolk in butter. Pour water, NESTLE® Carnation® Evap and  NESTLE® All Purpose Cream. Stir in cheese and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step2: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step3: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce with spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tuyo Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tuyo and tomato in oil.
Step2: Add rice and fluff for 2mins. Make a well in the center and pour beaten eggs. Cook until barely set. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Gently stir to mix all the ingredients.
Step3: Pour 2tbsp of water on the side and toss until steaming hot. Stir in scallions. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Utan Bisaya
instructions: Step1: Simmer gabi, kalabasa, sitaw, eggplant and okra in water for 5 minutes.
Step2: Add patola and fried galunggong.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in malunggay leaves. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Buttered Vegetables
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in butter until golden brown.
Step2: Add carrots, green beans, broccoli, cauliflower and corn. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cook for 2 minutes.
Step3: Add quail eggs. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Creamy Chicken Curry Recipe
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with 1 sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, potato, carrot and chicken in oil.
Step3: Add  bell peppers, curry powder and pepper. Pour water and simmer for 15 minutes.
Step4: Season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and stir in NESTLE All Purpose Cream. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Savorventure Tokwa Sisig
ingredients: 1 pc of Red And Green Chili
2 tbsp of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Fry tokwa in oil until light golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil. Cut into cubes.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, siling labuyo and tokwa. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor Classic. Transfer into a bowl.
Step3: Add onion, mayonnaise and NESTLE® All Purpose Cream. Serve on a hot sizzling plate. Top with toasted garlic, spring onion and calamansi.

name: Pork Menudo
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in 1 tbsp oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Season pork shoulder with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté pork in the same pan. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion and bell peppers. Pour tomato sauce and water. Add pork, bay leaf, pepper and sugar. Simmer for 45 minutes.
Step4: Add potato and carrot. Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and simmer for another 10 minutes.  Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Saucy Chopsuey
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper and pork in oil.
Step2: Pour water. Bring to a simmer and add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add  carrot, cauliflower, green beans, sayote and cabbage in 1 minute intervals. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Bangus with Gabi
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer water with onion, tomato and siling panigang for 10mins.
Step2: Add bangus and simmer for 3mins
Step3: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-min intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Crispy Squid
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Marinate squid in MAGGI® Savor Calamansi and  MAGGI® Magic Sarap® for 5 minutes.
Step2: Meanwhile, mix NESTLE® All Purpose Cream with garlic, spring onion, MAGGI® Savor Calamansi and pepper. Set aside as dipping sauce.

Step3: Combine flour and cornstarch. Coat squid well with the flour mixture. Fry in preheated oil over high heat for 1 minute. Strain and transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Repeat process in batches.
Step4: Transfer freshly cooked squid on a serving plate and serve with Garlic Cream Dip.

name: Pork  Mechado
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Add pork in the same pan and sauté until light golden brown. Add garlic, onion and tomato. Cook for 5mins.
Step3: Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, water and bay leaf. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cover and simmer for 45mins.
Step4: Add sautéed potato, carrot and bell peppers. Simmer for another 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pork Kilawin
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork belly with MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Mix well and refrigerate overnight.
Step2: Coat the pork with oil and grill pork for 4 – 5 minutes per side. Remove and set aside. Cut into bite-size pieces.
Step3: Combine vinegar, ginger, siling panigang, siling labuyo, sugar, calamansi juice and salt.
Step4: Assemble grilled pork belly, red onion, cucumber and mango on a plate. Drizzle vinegar mixture and serve.

name: Seafood Soup
instructions: Step1: Lightly sauté shrimp shells in oil. Crush shells to extract flavor. Pour water and simmer for 10mins. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Simmer broth with ginger, lemongrass, onion, tomato and siling panigang for 10mins.
Step3: Add shrimp, squid and clams. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®
Step4: Stir in malunggay. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Pork Tapa
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, soy sauce, pepper, garlic, sugar and chili. Refrigerate overnight.
Step2: Remove Pork Tapa from the refrigerator 1 hour before cooking.
Step3: Sauté marinated pork in oil. Cook until golden brown. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Sinigang na Sugpo sa Sampaloc
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer onion, tomatoes and siling panigang in a water for 10mins.
Step2: Add radish and sitaw. Add prawns and simmer for 1min.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Spicy Shrimp
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Sauté shrimp for 1 minute in 2 tbsp of oil, remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and chilies in remaining 1tbsp of oil. Add back shrimp and add MAGGI® Savor Classic. Sauté for another minute.
Step3: Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve.
Step4: Serve Crispy Shrimps with cucumber slices and spiced vinegar.

name: Ginisang Pechay at Tofu
instructions: Step1: Fry tofu in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside to cool.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion and ginger. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®
Step3: Cut tofu into bite-size pieces. Add tokwa and pechay to simmering sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Savorventure Cheesy Tuna Croquettes
ingredients: 2 cans of Fish, tuna, light, canned in oil, drained solids
instructions: Step1: Simmer potato in water until very tender. Drain and set aside.
Step2: Mash potato and mix in tuna, cheese, 1pc egg, spring onion and MAGGI® Savor Calamansi.  Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Form each portion into a 1 ½-inch balls. Set aside in the freezer.
Step4: Prepare flour, 2 pcs beaten eggs and breadcrumbs in 3 separate containers.
Step5: Coat croquettes with flour. Dip in beaten eggs and coat with breadcrumbs. Set aside in the freezer for another 15mins.
Step6: Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Serve warm with lemon.

name: Beijing-Style Beef Stir Fry
instructions: Step1: Season beef with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and 2tbsp MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step2: Combine cornstarch and flour. Coat beef well with the breading. Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Add garlic, siling labuyo, bell pepper, onion and scallion. Add water, remaining 2tbsp of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sweet chili sauce.
Step4: Add sautéed beef and cook for another 2mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Meatballs with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Mix pork, onion, 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. For into balls and set aside.
Step2: Sauté meatballs in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step3: Sauté garlic in the same pan. Add water, brown sugar, remaining 2tbsp of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Bring to simmer. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce.
Step4: Add back the sautéed meatballs and drizzle sesame oil. Gently simmer for 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate, top with scallion and serve.

name: Sinigang na Buto-buto with Gabi
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork with water with onion and tomato for 45mins.
Step2: Add finger chili, radish, okra and sitaw with 2 minutes intervals.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Pakbet
ingredients: 5 pcs of sitaw, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 pc of ampalaya, seeded and sliced
1 pc of eggplant, halved lengthwise and biased
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, bagoong and turmeric powder in oil. Add Palapang Sakurab and cook for 2mins.
Step2: Pour water and simmer. Add sitaw and kalabasa and cook for 5mins.
Step3: Add ampalaya, okra and eggplant. Cover and simmer for 5mins.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and cook for another 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Morcon
