instructions: Step1: Season beef with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Lay the beef flat and place bacon in single layer. Place carrot, pickled cucumber and chorizo in the middle. Roll tightly and truss using butcher’s twine.
Step2: Sauté beef in oil and set aside. Sauté garlic and onion in the same pan.
Step3: Add beef, tomato sauce, bay leaf, sugar and pepper. Pour enough water, cover and simmer until tender. Skim off the fat as needed.
Step4: Add olives and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step5: Remove beef from the sauce and cut off the twine. Cut into slices. Pour the sauce in a deep dish platter and place beef slices on top. Serve.

name: Ginisang Sitaw at Hipon
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in oil until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step2: Add onion and sitaw. Pour MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and cook for 2mins.
Step3: Pour water and bring to simmer. Stir in shrimp and cook for another minute.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate, top with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Magical Sinigang na Tilapia with Gabi
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer water with onion, tomato and finger chili for 10 minutes.
Step2: Add tilapia and simmer for 3 minutes.
Step3: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2 minute intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Pinaksiw na Bangus sa Sampalok
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with ½ pack MAGGI MAGIC SINIGANG Original Sampaloc Mix.?
Step2: Sauté garlic , ginger, finger chili and peppercorn in oil. Add bangus and cook for 2 minutes per side. ?

Step3: Dissolve remaining ½ pack MAGGI MAGIC SINIGANG Original Sampaloc Mix in water. Pour on the pan and add ampalaya and eggplant. Season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and simmer for 10 minutes. Transfer on a serving bowl and serve.?

name: Okoy
instructions: Step1: Combine flour, MAGGI®  MAGIC SARAP®  and pepper. Pour water and beaten egg. Mix well to create a smooth batter. Mix in the grated papaya and togue.
Step2: Carefully drop 2 large spoonful of the mixture in preheated oil and fry until golden brown. Drain excess oil.
Step3: Mix vinegar, garlic, onion, sugar and soy sauce. Serve Okoy with spiced vinegar.

name: Sinampalukang Manok with Gabi
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomato and siling panigang in oil.
Step2: Add chicken and fish sauce. Stir and cook for 5 minutes.
Step3: Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes. Add sitaw and simmer for another 2 minutes.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in bulaklak ng sampalok. Simmer for another 2 minutes. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Oystar Japchae
instructions:
Step1: Boil water in a pot. Add noodles and boil for 7 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water.
Drain well and set aside.

Step2: Season beef with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® . Preheat oil in a wok and sauté
beef for 1 minute. Remove and set aside.

Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper and carrot in the same wok for 2 minutes. Add water,
MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar, sesame oil and remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic
Sarap®. Add cooked noodles.

Step4: Stir in sautéed beef and spring onion and cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving
plate and serve.

name: Sinigang Fried Rice
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang With Gabi 25g
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water for 30 minutes. Add onion, tomato, finger chili and ½ pack of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Simmer for another 10 minutes.
Step2: Strain and reserve pork, onion, tomato, siling panigang and broth separately.
Step3: Fry pork in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside.
Step4: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Add reserved onion, tomato and finger chili. Sauté for 2 minutes.
Step5: Add rice, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and remaining ½ pack of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong and cook for 2 minutes.
Step6: Transfer rice on a serving plate. Place fried pork on top of rice. Serve with reserved Sinigang broth.

name: Lamb Curry
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Sauté pumpkin and eggplant separately in olive oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Season lamb with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Sauté in the same pan in olive oil.
Step3: Add garlic, siling labuyo and onion. Add turmeric, coriander, cumin, paprika and chili powder and tomato paste. Pour water, cover and simmer until tender.

Step4: Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in pumpkin and eggplant. Turn off heat and stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream to marble with the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and top with cilantro. Serve warm.

name: Pork and Tokwa Bola-bola
instructions: Step1: Mix ground pork with tokwa and egg. Season with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Form into 1 tbsp meatballs and set aside.
Step2: Sauté meatballs in oli until golden brow. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion and carrot in the same pan. Pour water and bring to simmer. Season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the soup. Add back sautéed meatballs and simmer for 2mins. Add spring onion, transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Lawuy
instructions: Step1: Simmer gabi, ginger and lemongrass in water.
Step2: Add kalabasa, eggplant, okra and simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add patola, galunggong, onion, spring onion, malunggay and saluyot. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Sardinas and Kalabasa Patties
instructions: Step1: Flake sardines and combine with onion, garlic, kalabasa, egg and flour. Season with ¾ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well and form into patties using mold.
Step2: Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.

Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic onion and tomato to 5 minutes. Pour reserve tomato sauce and water. Simmer for 2 minutes. Season with remaining ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Transfer patties on a serving plate, top with sauce and spring onion. Serve.

name: Pinatisang Fried Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add fish sauce, calamansi juice, garlic, pepper and sugar. Marinate overnight in the refrigerator.

Step2: Remove chicken from the refrigerator at least 1hr before cooking. Preheat oil over medium heat and fry chicken skin side up. Fry for 15mins while basting with the oil. Remove chicken and set aside to rest for 10mins.
Step3: Mix banana catsup with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step4: Cut chicken into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve with dipping sauce

name: Japanese-Style Katsu Curry
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion and apple in oil until golden brown. Add garlic, ginger and curry powder. Cook for 2 minutes.
Step2: Add flour and cook for 2mins. Stir in water and bring to simmer. Cook for 5mins. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a blender and purée until smooth.
Step3: Pour sauce back in a sauce pan, add carrots and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step4: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat well with flour, dip in beaten egg and coat well with bread crumbs. Set aside.
Step5: Pan fry chicken in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step6: Pour sauce on a plate. Slice chicken into strips, place on top of sauce and top with parsley. Serve warm.

name: Lomi
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and pork in oil.
Step2: Pour water, simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step3: Stir in noodles. Pour cornstarch and water mixture while mixing to thicken the broth.
Step4: Add carrots and cabbage. Stir in beaten egg. Transfer into a serving bowl, top with scallions and serve with calamansi.

name: Laing
ingredients: 5 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Combine coconut milk, garlic, ginger, alamang and pepper in a pan. Simmer while stirring.
Step2: Add tinapa and chilies. Gently stir and simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Pour coconut cream and stir in gabi leaves. Simmer for 15mins while occasionally stirring. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Laswa
instructions: Step1: Simmer onion, garlic and kalabasa in water for 5mins.
Step2: Add swahe, sitaw, eggplant and okra and simmer for another 2 minutes.
Step3: Stir in patola and saluyot. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Lechon Sisig
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, chilies and lechon in oil. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Transfer into a bowl. Add onion, MAGGI® Savor Classic, calamansi juice, sugar and pepper.
Step3: Preheat a sizzling plate. Add sisig, top with chicharon and serve immediately.

name: Bagnet Sinigang with Gabi
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork with water with onion and tomato for 45mins. Remove pork and set aside to cool completely.
Step2: Fry pork in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Simmer broth and add siling panigang, radish, okra and sitaw with 2-mins intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong and pork bagnet. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Bacon-Style Spicy Liempo
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork belly with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili and sugar overnight.
Step2: Remove pork from the refrigerator 1 hour before cooking
Step3: Fry in oil in batches until golden brown. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Ham and Mushroom Scrambled Egg
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper, ham and mushroom in butter. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Pour beaten egg and gently stir until barely set. Stir in parsley. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Fried Maya-maya
instructions: Step1: Season maya-maya with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.

Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry maya-maya for 4 – 5 mins per side. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a
plate and serve.

name: Java-Style Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté pork, garlic and onion in oil.
Step2: Add catsup, cooked rice and season with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Pour 2 tbsp of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Kung Pao-Style Chicken
ingredients: 6 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and mix in cornstarch. Sauté chicken in 1tbsp oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger, siling labuyo and peppers in remaining 2tbsp of oil.
Step3: Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar, chili sauce, peanuts and cooked chicken. Cook for another 2mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Imbaliktad
instructions: Step1: Cut of beef fat from meat of sirloin. Cut beef fat into small pieces and set aside. Cut beef into thin slices across the grain.
Step2: Add garlic, ginger MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper sukang Iloko and fish sauce to beef slices. Mix well and set aside.
Step3: Sauté beef fat in a pan to start rendering. Strain and set aside as topping.
Step4: Strain beef and reserve marinade. Add beef in the same pan with rendered beef fat and cook over high heat for 2mins. Pour reserved marinade and simmer for 2mins.
Step5: Add onion, finger chili and scallion. Simmer for another 2mins. Transfer on a serving plate, top with crispy beef fat and serve

name: Ginisang Papaya with Liempo
instructions: Step1: Combine oil and annatto seeds in a pan, heat for 1 minute and strain. Sauté garlic, shallots, pork in annatto oil.
Step2: Add peppercorn, vinegar and fish sauce. Cover and cook for 30 minutes.
Step3: Add papaya and bell pepper. Cook for another 5mins. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Ginger and Spring Onion Chicken Wings
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat well with flour and fry in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp and sauté ginger and spring onion. Add water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sugar. Simmer and stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken wings in simmering sauce and cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate.

name: Hotdog Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, hotdog and carrots in oil. Add banana catsup and cook for 1 minute.
Step2: Add rice and cook for 1 minute.  Push rice on the side and pour beaten eggs. Cook until barely set.
Step3: Season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and gently toss to mix well.
Step4: Stir in corn and spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Kare Kare
instructions:
Step1: Simmer oxtail in water. Drain and discard the water. Simmer blanched oxtail in water until slightly 
tender (approximately 2 - 3 hours). Add bay leaves and black peppercorn and simmer until very tender. 
Remove oxtail and set aside. Strain oxtail stock and reserve 8 cups.

Step2: While waiting for ox tail to tenderize, simmer tripe in water in another pot. Drain and discard the 
water. Repeat twice. Simmer blanched oxtail in water until tender. Drain and discard liquid.

Step3: Sauté garlic and onion in oil in a pot. Add ground rice. Stir in oxtail stock. Slowly add annatto water 
until desired color is achieved. Stir in the ground peanut and bring to a simmer. Add ox tail and tripe. 
Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.

Step4: For the vegetables, blanch sitaw and pechay separately. Fry eggplant in oil until golden brown and 
set aside.
Step5: Transfer kare-kare into a deep dish bowl, top with the vegetables and serve with bagoong.

name: Ilocos Lauya
instructions:
Step1: Combine pork with water, sukang Iloko, bay leaves and peppercorn in a pot with lid. Simmer for
1hr.
Step2: Add garlic, onion, fish sauce and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Continue to simmer until pork in tender.
Step3: Stir in cabbage. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Igado
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork meat with soy sauce, MAGGI Oyster Sauce, pepper and bay leaves. Set aside.

Step2: Place pork fat in a pan with ½ cup of water. Simmer until dry, Add oil and sauté pork fat until
golden brown. Add garlic, onion and tomato. Cook for 2mins. Add marinated pork and cook for
5mins.
Step3: Pour enough water to barely cover the pork. Cover with a lid and simmer for 30mins
Step4: Marinate pork liver with sukang Iloko. Set aside.
Step5: Add potato, carrot and bell pepper in pan and continue to cook for 5mins.
Step6: Rinse and drain pork liver. Add in the pan with green peas and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Simmer for 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Korean-Style Egg Drop Sandwich
ingredients: 8 pcs of thick sliced white bread
1 tbsp of thinly sliced spring onion
instructions: Step1: Lightly spread 2 tbsp of butter on bread slices and toast until light golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Mix 2 tbsp of mayonnaise and sriracha hot sauce. Lightly spread on the inside of the toasted bread.
Step3: Lightly sauté ham in oil. Place on top or the bread with the cheese.
Step4: Beat and season eggs with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Melt butter in a nonstick pan and pour eggs. Cook until barely set. Place on top of the ham to assemble the sandwich.
Step5: Mix remaining 2 tbsp of mayonnaise and  NESTLÉ® Carnation® Condensada. Drizzle on top of the egg. Top with spring onion and serve.

name: Fried Chicken 2-ways (Oyster Sauce)
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Coat well with flour. Pan fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, ginger and sugar. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Simmer until thick.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken pieces. Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve immediately.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: Step1: Simmer eggs for 8 minutes. Peel under running water and coarsely chop.
Step2: Combine egg, mayonnaise and pickle relish. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and sugar. Place in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
Step3: Serve on toasted pan de sal with tomato and  lettuce. Top with spring onion.

name: Embutido
instructions: Step1: Combine breadcrumbs and fresh milk. Set aside for 5 minutes.

Step2: Combine breadcrumbs and milk mixture with ground pork, carrot, pickle relish, raisins and bell peppers. Season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and mix
well.
Step3: Brush a little oil in aluminum foil and flatten 1 cup of the mixture. Place egg in a row and carefully roll into a log with the egg in the middle. Tie both ends of aluminum foil to tighten.
Step4: Steam for 30 minutes and set aside to cool. Unwrap and gently sauté until golden brown. Slice and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Dinengdeng
instructions: Step1: Simmer kalabasa, tomato, patani and bagoong in water.
Step2: Add bunga ng malunggay, eggplant and ampalaya. Simmer for 10mins.
Step3: Add bulaklak ng kalabasa, bangus and saluyot leaves. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Creamy Carbonara
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream, 250mL
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step2: Cook bacon in a pan to render fat. Strain bacon bits and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic in the same pan. Pour water and Nestlé® All Purpose Cream. Stir in cheese and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and garnish with bacon bits. Serve immediately.

name: Filipino-style Buffalo Wings with Ranch Dressing
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Season chicken wings with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat with flour. Set aside

Step2: Combine NESTLE® All Purpose Cream, lemon juice, mayonnaise, minced garlic, minced onion, parsley, spring onion in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.  Transfer into a serving bowl and refrigerate.
Step3: Fry chicken in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step4: Combine hot sauce, catsup and butter in bowl and immediately toss fried chicken wings. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with chilled Ranch dressing.

name: Bagnet
ingredients: 4 pcs of Tomatoes, red, ripe, canned, packed in tomato juice, no salt added
instructions: Step1: Season pork belly with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Place pork in a wok and pour vegetable oil. Cook  over low heat for 2hrs or until very tender. Strain pork and set aside to cool completely.
Step3: Preheat the same oil over high heat. Fry pork for 2 – 3 minutes or until golden brown and crispy. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Prepare spiced vinegar by mixing sukang Iloko, garlic, shallot, chili and bagoong Monamon
Step5: Mix tomato, bagoong Monamon and shallots.
Step6: Cut Bagnet into serving pieces and serve with spiced vinegar and tomato mixture.

name: Fried Liempo
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® garlic and pepper overnight in the refrigerator.
Step2: Remove pork from the refrigerator 1 hour before cooking. Fry pork in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside drain excess oil. Transfer on serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Chicken Mami
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water. Set aside the chicken and reserve the broth. Shred chicken.
Step2: Simmer broth and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Add noodles, carrot and pechay Baguio. Transfer into a serving bowl. Top with chicken, egg, toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Cheeseburger
instructions: Step1: Mix ground beef, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Portion into 4 patties and set aside.
Step2: Preheat a large pan and pour oil. Sauté burger for 2mins over medium high heat. Flip, place cheese and cook for another 2 mins. Remove and set aside to rest.
Step3: Lightly spread butter on burger buns and toast until light golden brown.
Step4: Mix mayonnaise, catsup and pickle relish. Spread lightly on toasted burger buns.
Step5: Assemble lettuce, tomato and burger patties on buns. Serve immediately.

name: Bulalo
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef in water until slightly tender. Skim off fat as needed.
Step2: Add onion, garlic, peppercorn and bay leaf.  Simmer until beef is very tender.
Step3: Add corn, potato and simmer for 10 minutes. Add cabbage and spring onion. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving bowl, top with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Easy Chicken Tocino
ingredients: 0.25 cup of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
0.5 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, to taste
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken MAGGI® Magic Sarap® with MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili, pineapple juice, sugar and catsup overnight in the refrigerator.
Step2: Place Chicken Tocino with the marinade in a pan. Simmer until almost dry.
Step3: Pour oil and sauté chicken until golden brown and caramelized. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: All-in-One Ginisang Ampalaya
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in oil.
Step2: Add ampalaya and sauté for 5 minutes. Stir in beaten egg and cook until barely set.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pour water. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Fried Chicken Sandwich
ingredients: 1 pc of large red onion, thinly sliced into rings
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat well with flour and set aside for 5mins.
Step2: Toss the chicken again in flour and fry in preheated oil over medium high heat for 10mins or until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Mix mayonnaise, garlic and pepper. Spread mayonnaise mixture on toasted buns. Assemble lettuce, tomato, onion and freshly cooked fried chicken. Serve immediately.

name: Inaluban Tuna
ingredients: 1 bunch of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Season tuna with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté in a pan with oil for 1min. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, finger chili, Palapang Sakurab and fish sauce in the same pan.
Step3: Add sautéed tuna and coconut milk. Simmer for 10mins. Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step4: Stir in chili leaves. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Litsong Baka Sisig
ingredients: 1.5 containers of store-bought Litson Baka, coarsely chopped
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step2: Add beef in the same pan. Cook for 2 minutes. Add green siling panigang, siling labuyo and onion.
Step3: Drizzle MAGGI Savor Classic and calamansi juice. Transfer on a sizzling plate, top with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Ilocos-style Pinakbet
ingredients: 3 pcs of Tomatoes, red, ripe, cooked
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and fry until golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Combine garlic, onion, tomato, finger chili, bagoong isda and water in a pot, cover and simmer for 10mins.
Step3: Add kalabasa, okra and sigarilyas in 2-min intervals. Add ampalaya, eggplant and fried bangus and simmer for 5mins.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and simmer for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.
Step5: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and simmer for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.
Step6: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and simmer for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chicken Menudo
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in 1 tbsp oi. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Season chicken 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Sauté in oil. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, red and green bell pepper, chorizo de Bilbao and tomato paste in remaining oil for 5 minutes.

Step4: Pour water and add chicken, potato and carrot and bay leaf. Simmer for 20 minutes. Stir in green peas and raisins. Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, pepper and sugar. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Supreme Sweet and Spicy Eggs
instructions: Step1: Boil water and carefully place egg to simmer for 5mins. Drain and run under tap water to cool eggs. Peel and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and siling labuyo in oil.
Step3: Pour water.  Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Add eggs and pechay. simmer for 5mins.
Step4: Transfer pechay and sauce on a serving plate. Cut eggs in half and place on top of pechay. Top with chili sauce, toasted garlic and spring onion

name: Aglio Olio
instructions: Step1: Cook spaghetti according to package direction.
Step2: Meanwhile, gently heat olive oil in a pan with garlic and chili flakes. Pour 1 cup of the pasta water and simmer.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Stir in parsley and Parmesan cheese (optional).
Step4: Strain pasta and toss in the sauce. Cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Dinengdeng (Inabraw)
ingredients: 2 pcs of Tomatoes, red, ripe, cooked
instructions: Step1: Combine bagoong and water in a pot. Bring to a full boil. Strain out pieces of fish from the simmering broth. Add garlic, onion, tomato and dried shrimps. Simmer for 5mins.
Step2: Add bulaklak ng kalabasa, saluyot and grilled tilapia. Simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Stir in malunggay leaves and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Tokwa Steaks with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Fry tokwa in oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic until light golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Add ginger, onion and siling labuyo in the same pan. Cook for 1min. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and simmer for another 2mins.
Step4: Transfer tokwa on a serving plate. Pour sauce and top with toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Misua Bola-bola
instructions: Step1: Combine ground pork, onion, carrot and egg. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix, form into meatballs and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in oil in a pot. Pour water and simmer. Add meatballs and patola. Simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Season with remaining 1 ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in miswa and spring onion. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Filipino-Style Roast Beef
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season beef with 1 sachet of 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Preheat a braising pot and pour oil. Sear the beef on all sides. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Add onion, carrot, celery and garlic in the same pot. Cook for 5 minutes. Add tomato paste and continue to cook for another 2 minutes. Place back beef and pour water.
Step3: Bring to a boil, skim the scum, add bay leaves and peppercorn and simmer while covered for 2 hours or until tender. Remove beef to rest and strain beef broth. Reserve 3 cups of broth.

Step4: Sauté mushroom  in butter for 2 minutes. Add flour and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in reserved beef broth. Simmer until slightly thick. Season with 1 sachet of 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor.  Stir in NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream and half of the parsley in to the sauce.
Step5: Cut beef into ¼-inch thick slices. Transfer on a serving plate and pour sauce. Top with remaining parsley and serve warm.

name: Sweet and Sour Maya-Maya
instructions: Step1: Season snapper with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, coat with flour and fry in oil until golden brown. Drain excess oil and transfer on a plate.

Step2: Remove oil leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté onion, scallion, bell peppers and garlic. Add vinegar, sugar , catsup and water. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Pour on top of fried snapper and serve immediately.

name: Tuna Caldereta
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Season tuna with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté tuna in 1tbsp of oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Pour remaining 2tbsp oil in the same pan. Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, bell peppers, siling labuyo and liver spread in the same pan.
Step3: Add bay leaf, water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Add sautéed tuna and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Step4: Stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and half of cheese. Transfer on a serving plate, top with remaining cheese and serve.

name: Fish Sarciado
instructions: Step1: Heat cooking oil. Sauté garlic, onion and tomatoes until fragrant and wilted. Pour in water and bring to boil.
Step2: Add beaten eggs and continue stirring to scramble the eggs. Season with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Add fried galunggong and simmer with the sauce for another minute. Serve.

name: ALL-IN-ONEderful Tortang Sardinas
ingredients: 2 cans of Sardines in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, carrot, sardines and sayote in 2 tbsp of oil. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour in the pan and mix over low heat until barely set.
Step3: Place a plate to cover, flip and slide back the egg to the pan to cook the other side. Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve warm.

name: Restaurant-style Wings
ingredients: 3 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and 1tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili and set aside.
Step2: While marinating the chicken, fry sweet potato in preheated oil until light golden brown. Strain and toss with 1tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili.
Step3: Place marinated chicken in a nonstick pan with 2 tbsp of water. Simmer until almost dry. Add oil and fry chicken wings until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Transfer chicken wings and sweet potato fries on a serving plate. Top with spring onion and serve with banana catsup mixed with remaining 1tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili.

name: Pan Roasted Pork Tenderloin with Mustard Cream Sauce
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, garlic, thyme and sage overnight in the refrigerator.
Step2: Remove pork 1hr from the refrigerator before cooking. Sauté pork in olive oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside to rest.
Step3: Add mustard and water in the same pan. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and parsley.
Step4: Slice pork tenderloin, transfer on a serving plate and serve with Mustard Cream Sauce.

name: Ginisang Togue
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and tokwa in oil.
Step2: Add carrot and green beans. Cook for 2 minutes.
Step3: Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step4: Stir in bean sprouts. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Bangus Bistek
instructions: Step1: Fry potato in preheated oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté onion in the same oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Season bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat well with flour. Fry in the same oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step4: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic until light golden brown. Pour water and simmer. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, calamansi juice, sugar and pepper. Add back fried bangus and potato and simmer for 2 minutes.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate, top with sautéed onion, spring onion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Fish Lumpia
instructions: Step1: Mix leftover fish,  garlic and onion, singkamas, carrot, eggs and kinchay. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and mix well.
Step2: Place 1 tbsp of the mixture on a lumpia wrapper, roll tightly and seal with flour and water mixture. Assemble the rest of the lumpia.
Step3: Fry lumpia in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Spaghetti with Spanish Style Sardines
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.

Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and sardines in oil. Pour pasta water and season with MAGGI® Magic 
Sarap®.

Step3: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce with spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate, top with kesong
puti and serve.

name: Pancit Habhab Recipe
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, pork, liver and shrimp in oil. Pour water and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and MAGGI®  Oyster Sauce.
Step2: Stir in noodle and cook until almost dry. Add carrot, sayote and pechay.
Step3: Transfer into serving plate lined with banana leaves and serve with spiced vinegar or calamansi.

name: Tortang Alimasag
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato, crab fat, crab meat and spring onion in oil.
Step2: Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and calamansi juice.
Step3: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour egg in the pan and stir until barely set.
Step4: Cover with plate, flip and slide back in the pan to cook the other side. Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve warm.

name: Steamed Lapu-Lapu
instructions: Step1: Season lapu-lapu with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stuff with spring onion and ginger. Place in a plate and cook in a steamer for 20-30mins. Remove from the steamer and set aside to rest. Reserve liquid.
Step2: Combine water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, spring onion, ginger, and liquid from the fish in a pot. Bring to simmer and set aside.
Step3: Heat oil in a pan and carefully pour on top of fish. Pour sauce and garnish with kinchay. Serve immediately.

name: Asian Chicken Spaghetti
ingredients: 0.25 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.

Step2: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and 1/8 tsp of pepper.  Sauté chicken, garlic,  onion and chili in oil. Pour water and add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, hoisin sauce, remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, 1/8 tsp of pepper, brown sugar and sesame oil.
Step3: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce with spring onion and sesame seeds. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Isda sa Miso
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomato, finger chili and miso in oil. Pour water and simmer.
Step2: Pour MAGGI Magic Sinigang® Original Sampalok Mix , fish sauce and sugar. Add maya-maya and simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Stir in mustasa. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Crunchy Calamares with Tomato and Garlic Dip
instructions: Step1: For Tomato Dip, sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add tomato sauce and water. Simmer until thick. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Stir in parsley. Transfer into serving bowl and set aside.
Step2: For the Garlic Dip, combine mayonnaise, garlic, sugar, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Mix well. Transfer into a serving bowl and set aside.
Step3: Season squid with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and calamansi juice. Coat well with flour.
Step4: Fry in preheated oil until light golden brown. Strain and transfer on a plate. Serve with Tomato and Garlic Dips.

name: Chicken Lollipops
instructions: Step1: Season chicken  with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step2: Coat well with flour, dip in beaten egg and coat well with bread crumbs. Set aside.
Step3: Fry chicken in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with dipping sauce.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken back in water for 30 minutes. Reserve broth and shred chicken.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, carrot and celery in oil. Pour chicken broth and simmer.
Step3: Stir in macaroni and simmer for 10 minutes. Season with MAGGIi® MAGIC SARAP®. Add shredded chicken and spring onion. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Fried Garlic-Butter Chicken Wings
instructions: Step1: Season chicken wings with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step2: Coat well with flour. Pan fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step3: Sauté garlic in butter. Add fried chicken and coat with the garlic and butter. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Hipon sa Sampalok
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer water with onion, tomato and finger chili for 10 minutes.
Step2: Add radish, okra, sitaw and shrimp with 2-minute intervals.
Step3: Pour  MAGGI® Maggi Sinigang® Original Sampalok Mix. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Tinolang Isda
instructions: Step1: Combine water, onion, tomato, ginger, lemongrass, finger chili and bell pepper in a pot. Simmer for 10mins.
Step2: Add malasugi and simmer for 1min.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and stir in scallion and  malunggay. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Spicy Chicken Popcorn
ingredients: 0.5 kg of Chicken, dark meat, thigh, meat only, with added solution, raw
1 tbsp of Sauce, peppers, hot, chili, mature red, canned
instructions: Step1: Combine flour and cornstarch. Set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix in egg. Coat with flour and cornstarch mixture.
Step3: Fry in preheated oil for 3mins over medium high heat. Strain and set aside.
Step4: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, chili sauce, catsup and sesame seeds.
Step5: Add fried chicken popcorn and toss until well coated. Transfer into a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve immediately.

name: Tunasilog
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step2: Add tuna in the same pan and cook for 2mins. Stir in onion and season with 2tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Calamansi. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Add rice in the same pan. Season with remaining 1tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Calamansi and ¾ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into serving plates and top with sautéed tuna.
Step4: Fry eggs in vegetable oil until crispy. Season remaining ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® Place on top of the rice.
Step5: Top with scallion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately

name: Crispy Binagoongang Baboy
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water until tender. Remove and set aside to cool. Reserve 1 cup of pork broth. Fry pork in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, chili, bagoong and eggplant. Add vinegar, sugar and reserve broth. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add  kangkong and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Chop crispy pork and stir in the sauce. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Sweet and Sour Pork
instructions: Step1: Season pork with ½ sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, coat with flour and fry in oil. Remove and set aside.

Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp and sauté  garlic, pineapple and bell peppers. Add vinegar, sugar, water and banana catsup. Season with remaining 1 ½ sachets of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce.
Step3: Add pork and cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Tuna Salpicao
ingredients: 2 tbls of Maggi® Soy Cooking And Seasoning Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in oil until light golden brown. Strain and reserve toasted garlic for garnish.
Step2: Season tuna with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Sauté in garlic oil for 1 minute. Add soy souce and cook for another minute.
Step3: Transfer on a serving plate, garnish with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Lechon Belly
instructions: Step1: Season flesh side of pork with 2 sachets of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Add onion, garlic, scallions, lemongrass and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Marinate overnight.

Step2: Place aromatics in the center of the pork and tie into a roll using a butcher’s twine. Simmer in water until tender. Remove and set aside to cool. Brush the skin with vinegar, season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and set aside.
Step3: For the dip, combine vinegar, MAGGI Soy, garlic, onion, chili, pepper and sugar in a bowl. Mix well and set aside.?
Step4: Preheat oil and deep fry pork until golden brown. Set aside. Remove butcher’s twine and cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with sauce.?

name: Chicken Katsu with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Mix breadcrumbs and sesame seeds. Set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat well with flour, dip in egg and press in breadcrumb and sesame seed mixture.
Step3: Pan fry breaded chicken in preheated oil for 2mins per side. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Remove oil leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, chili and sugar. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce.
Step5: Slice chicken into serving pieces, drizzle sauce on top, add spring onion and serve immediately.

name: Garlic Chicken Steak with Gravy
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with ½ sachet MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic in oil until light golden brown. Strain toasted garlic and set aside for topping.
Step3: Pan fry chicken in the same pan with garlic-oil for 2mins per side. Transfer into a plate to set aside for 10mins.
Step4: Add flour in the same pan and cook for 1min. Stir in water and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add resting juices from the chicken.
Step5: Slice chicken into serving pieces. Transfer into a serving plate. Pour gravy and top with spring onion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Ilocos-style Yusi
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, shallots and ginger in oil. Add pork and fish sauce and cook for 2mins.
Step2: Pour water, cover and simmer for 40mins.
Step3: Add in liver and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in spring onion. Transfer on a serving bowl and serve.

name: Insarabasab (Tinuno)
ingredients: 2 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and MAGGI Savor Chilimansi. Marinate overnight.

Step2: . Grill pork belly over medium heat until golden brown and skin is crispy.. Cut into bite-size pieces
and transfer on a mixing bowl.
Step3: Add garlic, ginger, onion, scallion, finger chili, red chili and sukang Iloko. Mix well, transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Oyster Glazed Chicken Nuggets
ingredients: 0.5 kg of Chicken, nuggets, dark and white meat, precooked, frozen, not reheated
instructions: Step1: Fry chicken nuggets in oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan. Add butter and garlic. Sauté garlic until light golden brown. Add sugar, water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Simmer until thick.
Step3: Add fried chicken nuggets and toss over medium heat until well coated. Transfer into a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Glazed Fried Chicken Meatballs
instructions: Step1: Mix ground chicken, carrot, onion, egg, sesame oil and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well until sticky. Refrigerate for 1hr to firm up ground chicken. Form into meatballs and refrigerate for another 30mins.
Step2: Lightly coat chicken meatballs with flour. Pan fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan. Add butter, sugar and MAGGI Oyster Sauce. Gently heat for 1min.
Step4: Add back fried chicken meatballs to coat with the glaze.
Step5: Skewer chicken meatballs and transfer into a serving plate. Top with spring onion and sesame seeds. Serve warm.

name: Pork Katsu-Style Sandwich
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Dredge well in flour, dip in egg and coat with breadcrumbs. Set aside.
Step2: Fry breaded pork in preheated oil over medium high heat until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Mix MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and catsup to make sauce for the pork. Set aside.
Step4: Lightly spread mayonnaise on white bread. Assemble fried pork, sauce and lettuce. Trim off the edges and cut in half. Serve immediately,

name: Kilawing Puso ng Saging
instructions: Step1: Peel outer layers of puso ng saging until tender part. Cut in half lengthwise and slice ¼-inch thick. Soak in salted water for 15mins. Drain, rinse and squeeze the water out. Set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and pork belly in oil for 3mins. Add puso ng saging and cook for another 2mins.
Step3: Pour vinegar and fish sauce. Cook uncovered for 5mins. Pour water, cover and simmer for 10mins.
Step4: Add siling panigang and red chili. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Simmer for 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Dinakdakan (Warek-warek)
ingredients: 100 g of Pork, fresh, variety meats and by-products, brain, raw
2 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork cheeks in water for 1hr. Strain and set aside to cool completely.
Step2: Simmer pig’s brain in water for 10mins. Strain, mash and set aside
Step3: Cut into pork cheeks into 1-inch slices and coat with MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi. Preheat a clean grill and brush with oil. Grill pork over medium heat until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step4: Cut pork into strips and transfer on a mixing bowl. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap and pepper.
Step5: Add onion, ginger, green finger chili and red chili. Add calamansi juice and sukang Iloko and pig’s brain. Mix well, transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Fluffy Omelette
instructions: Step1: Separate egg yolks from egg whites.
Step2: Whip egg whites until stiff peaks.
Step3: Whisk egg yolks with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Fold in whipped egg whites.
Step4: Melt butter in a nonstick pan and pour whipped egg. Spread evenly, cover and cook for 2 minutes over low heat.
Step5: Slide out of the pan on a plate and fold. Serve immediately.

name: Baked Cheesy Bangus
ingredients: 2 pcs of Tomatoes, red, ripe, cooked
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and MAGGI® Savor Classic. Place on a baking tray.
Step2: Mix garlic, onion, tomato and scallion. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Spread on top of the bangus. Grate melting cheese on top.
Step3: Bake in a preheated oven for 15mins or until bangus is cooked and cheese is golden brown.
Step4: Set aside to rest for 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve warm.

name: Chicken Pad Thai
ingredients: 0.25 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
1.5 tsp of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
1 cup of Beans, pinto, mature seeds, canned, drained solids, rinsed in tap water
instructions: Step1: Beat egg and season with ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan and cook egg until barely set. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté chicken in 1 tbsp of oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, chili and tofu in remaining 2 tbsp of oil. Pour water and simmer. Add remaining 1 ½ sachets of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix, sugar, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sesame oil.
Step4: Stir in noodles, cover and cook over medium heat for 5mins.
Step5: Add egg, chicken, bean sprouts, spring onion and peanuts. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with lime.

name: Sweet and Sour Tilapia
instructions: Step1: Season tilapia with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry tilapia for 4 – 5 minutes per side. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Remove oil leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, carrot and bell pepper. Pour vinegar, water, sugar and catsup and simmer. Season with remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Stir in cornstarch and water mixture. Transfer fried tilapia on a serving plate. Pour sauce on top, add scallions and serve immediately.

name: Crunchy Fish Fillet Sandwich
instructions: Step1: Mix mayonnaise, pickle relish, shallot, lemon juice, salt, pepper and parsley. Set aside.
Step2: Season fish fillet with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Dredge in flour, dip in egg and coat well with breadcrumbs. Set aside.
Step3: Fry breaded fish fillet in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Toast burger buns until light golden brown. Spread mayonnaise mixture on toasted burger buns.
Step5: Assemble sandwiches with fish fillet with lettuce and tomato.  Serve immediately.

name: Charlie Chan-Style Chicken Pasta
ingredients: 0.25 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
instructions: Step1: Boil spaghetti according to package direction.
Step2: Season chicken thigh with ½ sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®.  Sauté chicken in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Add garlic in the same pan and sauté until golden brown, strain and set aside.

Step4: Add onion and mushroom in the same pan. Cook for 2mins. Pour water and bring to simmer. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, remaining 1 ½ sachet of MAGGI Magic Sarap®, chili flakes, soy sauce, sugar, peanut butter. Drizzle sesame oil.
Step5: Drain spaghetti and toss in the simmering sauce. Add chicken, toasted garlic, spring onion and peanuts. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Paksiw na Galunggong
instructions: Step1: Season galunggong with ½ sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®®.
Step2: Sauté garlic , ginger and finger chili in oil. Add galunggong, vinegar and peppercorn. Simmer for 2 minutes.
Step3: Add ampalaya, eggplant and water. Simmer for another 10 minutes. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Paksiw na Boneless Bangus
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Sauté garlic , ginger and finger chili in oil. Add bangus, vinegar and peppercorn. Simmer for 2 minutes.
Step3: Add water and simmer for another 15mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve

name: Magical Fried Chicken Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Combine tomato, onion, radish and finger chili in a bowl. Add vinegar, sugar and fish sauce. Mix well and set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with ½ pack of MAGGI MAGIC Sinigang Original, MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Set aside for 10 minutes.

Step3: Combine flour and remaining ½ pack of MAGGI MAGIC Sinigang Original. Coat chicken well and fry in preheated oil for 10 minutes or until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Serve fried chicken with tomato salad.

name: Adobong Galunggong
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, chili and peppercorn in oil.  Add galunggong and cook for 2 minutes per side.
Step2: Pour vinegar and simmer for 2 minutes.
Step3: Pour water and MAGGI Oyster Sauce. Add bay leaf and MAGGI Magic Sarap®. Simmer for 10 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Piaparang Manok
ingredients: 1 kg of chicken leg, thigh and wings, rinsed and drained well
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté chicken in oil until light golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, chili, turmeric powder and Palapang Sakurab for 5mins. Add grated coconut and cook for 2mins.
Step3: Add sautéed chicken, coconut milk and remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Simmer for 20mins.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Spicy Red Munggo
ingredients: 0.25 kg of red bean munggo, rinsed well and soak in water for 2hrs and drained
instructions: Step1: Place red bean munggo in a pot and cover with water. Simmer while covered for 30mins. Drain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, Palapang Sakurab and turmeric powder in oil for 5mins.
Step3: Add beans and cook for 2mins. Beat eggs and add to the pan. Cook while stirring for another 3mins.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Balbacua
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion, garlic, tomato and Palapang Sakurab in oil for 10mins.
Step2: Add turmeric powder, ampalayang uwak and grated coconut. Cook for 5mins.
Step3: Pour coconut milk and water. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cover and simmer for another 10mins.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Crispy Fish Fingers
ingredients: 0.5 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Marinate fish with 2tbsp MAGGI® Savor Calamansi for 5mins. Dredge in flour, dip well with egg and coat with breadcrumbs.
Step2: Marinate fish with 2tbsp MAGGI® Savor Calamansi for 5mins. Dredge in flour, dip well with egg and coat with breadcrumbs.
Step3: Fry in preheated oil for 2-3mins. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Fry in preheated oil for 2-3mins. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step5: Mix NESTLE® All Purpose Cream, mayonnaise, garlic, 1 tbsp MAGGI® Savor Calamansi, spring onion and pepper.
Step6: Mix NESTLE® All Purpose Cream, mayonnaise, garlic, 1 tbsp MAGGI® Savor Calamansi, spring onion and pepper.
Step7: Transfer Fish Fingers on a serving plate and serve with dipping sauce. (1min)

name: Piaparang Hito
ingredients: 1 kg of catfish (hito), cut into serving pieces, cleaned, rinsed and drained well
instructions: Step1: Season catfish with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and 1 tbsp of turmeric powder. Fry fish in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, chili, Palapang Sakurab and remaining 1 tbsp of turmeric powder for 5mins. Add grated coconut and cook for 2mins.
Step3: Add fried fish, coconut milk, water and remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Simmer for 15mins.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Piaparang Ampalayang Uwak
ingredients: 0.5 kg of ampalayang uwak, halved seeded and rinsed well
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion, garlic, tomato and Palapang Sakurab in oil for 10mins.
Step2: Add turmeric powder, ampalayang uwak and grated coconut. Cook for 5mins.
Step3: Pour coconut milk and water. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cover and simmer for another 10mins.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Beef Rendang
instructions: Step1: Season beef with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add ground rice, Palapang Sakurab, turmeric, lemongrass and lime zest. Mix well and set aside to marinate.
Step2: Sauté onion and garlic in oil for 2mins. Add marinated beef and sauté for 5mins. Add grated coconut and cook for another 5mins.
Step3: Pour coconut milk, add bay leaves and remaining sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cover and simmer until beef is tender.
Step4: Transfer into a serving plate, top with red chili and spring onion and serve.

name: Palapang Sakurab
ingredients: 1 pc of onion, cut into strips
instructions: Step1: Cut off root end and dried parts of sakurab. Soak in water for 10mins. Rinse and drain well. Slice sakurab thinly and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, sakurab and chili in oil until tender.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and add turmeric power. Cook for another 10mins.
Step4: Transfer into a clean glass container. Serve Palapang Sakurab as a condiment or a side dish.

name: Kaliket (Pastil)
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken breast in water for 15mins. Strain and set aside to cool. Shred and set side.
Step2: Sauté chicken in oil crispy and light golden brown.
Step3: Add garlic, onion and chili. Cook for 5mins.
Step4: Add MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, turmeric powder, vinegar, soy sauce and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Cook for another 10mins.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Balbacua
ingredients: 0.5 kg of ampalayang uwak, halved seeded and rinsed well
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion, garlic, tomato and Palapang Sakurab in oil for 10mins.
Step2: Add turmeric powder, ampalayang uwak and grated coconut. Cook for 5mins.
Step3: Pour coconut milk and water. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cover and simmer for another 10mins.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Palapang Niyog
ingredients: 30 pcs of Red And Green Chili
instructions: Step1: Sauté grated coconut in a dry pan over low heat until fragrant and light golden brown.
Step2: Add turmeric, ginger, chili and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté for another 10mins.
Step3: Set aside to cool completely. Transfer into a clean jar and refrigerate for later use.

name: Vegetable Fritters
ingredients: 2 cups of vegetable oil for frying
3 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Combine carrot, sweet potato, corn, red onion and spring onion. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add flour and coat well. Set aside.
Step2: To make the batter, mix flour with cornstarch. Pour ice cold water and mix until just combined. Batter must be very cold, lumpy and slightly runny.

Step3: Mix vegetables with the batter. Scoop about 3 tbsp of the mixture using a ladle. Carefully drop in preheated oil and fry for 3 – 4 minutes per side. Do this in batches to maintain temperature of the oil.
Step4: Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Cut into serving pieces and serve with MAGGI Savor Hot Chili.

name: Oyster Chinese-Style Pork Asado
instructions:
Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Heat oil in a sauce pan just big
enough for the size of the pork. Sauté pork until golden brown.

Step2: Add garlic, ginger, Chinese cooking wine, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar, five
spice powder and pepper. Pour just enough water to cover pork. Simmer
for 45 minutes. Remove pork and set aside.
Step3: Simmer cooking liquid until slightly thick.
Step4: Cut pork into ¼ -inch thick slices. Pour sauce and serve with bokchoy.

name: Savorventure Mushroom Sisig
ingredients: 1 pc of green finger chili, seeded and biased
2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
1 pc of large red onion, chopped
instructions: Step1: Soak shiitake and earwood mushroom in hot water for 10 minutes. Squeeze water out, cut of stem and cut into ¼-inch pieces. Set aside with button mushrooms.
Step2: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté mushrooms in butter for 3 minutes. Add green finger chili and red chili. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, pepper, sugar, MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili and calamansi juice.
Step4: Transfer on a sizzling plate and mix in red onion. Drizzle mayonnaise and top toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Poqui-poqui
ingredients: 3 pcs of Tomatoes, red, ripe, cooked
instructions: Step1: Pierce the eggplant with a fork. Roast over an open flame until charred. Transfer into a bowl and cover  for 5mins to steam. Peel off charred skin. Cut eggplant into 1-inch pieces.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in oil for 2mins. Add eggplant and cook for another 3mins. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour into the pan and cook until set. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Adubong Manok na Maluya
ingredients: 1  of thumb-sized ginger, cut into strips
1 kg of whole chicken, rinsed, drained well and cut into serving pieces
4 pcs of potato, cut into serving pieces
2 pcs of carrot, cut into serving pieces
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, finger chili and turmeric in oil for 2mins.
Step2: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add in the pan and sauté for 2mins.
Step3: Pour vinegar and simmer for 5mins. Add peppercorn, Palapang Sakurab, potato and carrot. Sauté for another 5mins.
Step4: Add water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sugar. Cover and simmer for 10mins.
Step5: Remove cover and simmer for another 10mins to reduce sauce. Transfer on a place and serve.

name: Oyster Yakisoba
ingredients: 0.25 kg of small shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® . Sauté in 1 tbsp of oil for 1 minute. Remove and set aside.

Step2: Pour remaining oil in the same pan. Sauté garlic and onion. Pour water
and add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, pepper and sesame oil.
Step3: Stir in noodles and cook for 5 minutes.

Step4: Add carrots, cabbage, spring onion and sautéed shrimps. Cook for
another 2 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate, top with sesame
seeds and serve.

name: Savorventure Marinated Pork Liempo
ingredients: 6 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Season pork belly with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Add MAGGI® Savor hot chili and garlic. Marinate in the refrigerator overnight.
Step2: Remove pork from the refrigerator 1 hour before grilling. Brush lightly with oil and grill over charcoal for 10 minutes per side. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes.
Step3: Cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Adobong Itlog at Kangkong
instructions: Step1: Boil water and carefully place egg to simmer for 5mins. Drain and run under tap water to cool eggs. Peel and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil.
Step3: Add vinegar and cook for 2mins.  Pour water and add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add eggs and simmer for 5mins.
Step4: Stir in kangkong and cook for 2mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Veggie Lumpia
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and tokwa in oil. Add bean sprouts, carrot and cabbage. Cook for 1min over high heat. Season with MAGGI® Savor Classic and 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a platter and spread to cool rapidly.
Step2: Assemble 2 – 3 tbsp of the filling on every lumpia wrapper. Seal with flour and water mixture.
Step3: Fry in preheated oil until golden brow. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Pigar-pigar Style Litsong Baka
ingredients: 1.5 cups of store-bought Litson Baka, sliced
1 pc of Small green bell pepper
1 pc of Small red bell pepper
instructions: Step1: Sauté beef in oil until golden brown. Strain leaving oil in the pan.
Step2: Sauté garlic in the same pan until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté onion and bell peppers in the same pan for 2 minutes. Add cauliflower and green beans. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Step4: Add cabbage and season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Pour water, cover and cook for 1 minute.
Step5: Transfer vegetables on a serving plate, top with beef and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Munggo Burger Steak
instructions: Step1: Simmer munggo in water until very tender. Strain and mash. Set aside to cool.
Step2: Mix mashed munggo with ground pork, onion, carrot, egg and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well and form into patties. Set aside.
Step3: Fry patties in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step4: To make the sauce, sauté garlic and onion in the same pan. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Place back cooked patties and simmer for 2mins.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve.

name: Tapsilog-Style Litsong Baka
ingredients: 1.5 cups of store-bought Litson Baka, sliced
instructions: Step1: Combine beef, garlic, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar, siling labuyo, vinegar and water in a pan. Simmer until almost dry.
Step2: Pour vegetable oil and continue to cook over medium heat until golden brown. Transfer on a serving plate and top with spring onion.
Step3: Add garlic in the same pan and cook until light golden brown. Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate.
Step4: Fry eggs in oil and season lightly with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Serve with Beef and Sinangag.

name: Thai-Inspired Chicken and Mango Salad
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken in MAGGI® Magic Sarap, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sesame oil and siling labuyo.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill. Coat chicken with oil and grill for 2 minutes per side. Remove and set aside to rest for 5 minutes. Cut into bite-size pieces and place in a bowl with resting juices.
Step3: Add cucumber, tomato and mango in the same bowl with the chicken. Gently toss and set aside.
Step4: Scatter lettuce on a serving plate. Add chicken mixture and top with sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

name: Magical Canned Tuna Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomato and finger chili in oil in a pot.
Step2: Pour water, cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step3: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Stir in tuna and kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Sardines Spaghetti
ingredients: 2 cans of Spicy Sardines in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Step1: Boil spaghetti according to package direction.
Step2: Sauté garlic in oil until light golden brown. Strain garlic and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté onion, tomato and sardines in the same pan. Pour water and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Drain spaghetti and toss in the sauce. Cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate, top with toasted garlic, cheese and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Bacon Loaded Carbonara
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step2: Cook bacon with oil until golden brown. Strain crispy bacon and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic in the same pan. Pour water and NESTLE® All Purpose Cream. Stir in cheese and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step4: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and top with bacon and parsley. Serve immediately.

name: Crispy Litsong Baka Fried Rice
ingredients: 1 cup of store-bought Litson Baka, shredded
instructions: Step1: Sauté beef in oil until slightly crispy. Strain leaving oil in the pan. Set aside beef to cool.
Step2: Sauté garlic in the same pan until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Add onion, tomato and siling panigang in the same pan. Cook for 1min. Add rice and cook for 2mins.

Step4: Push the rice on one side of the pan, pour eggs and cook for 30secs. Gently fluff to mix all ingredients together. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and stir in spring onion and half of the crispy beef.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate, top with rest of the crispy beef and toasted garlic. Serve with MAGGI® Savor Classic as tabletop.

name: Sardines Curry
ingredients: 2 cans of Spicy Sardines in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and curry powder in the same pan. Add sardines, sauce, sautéed potato and carrot. Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in coconut cream. Transfer on a serving bowl and top with spring onion.

name: Fried Tilapia with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Season tilapia with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Add onion and tomato in the same pan. Sauté for 2mins. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Simmer until slightly thick.
Step4: Transfer fried tilapia on a serving plate. Pour sauce and top with toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Asian-Style Salad with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Gently simmer chicken in a pot with water for 10mins. Strain and set aside to cool. Shred into bite-size pieces.
Step2: Set aside 6 big leaves of lettuce as base for the salad. Place on a serving plate. Shred the rest of the lettuce.
Step3: Prepare the dressing by combining garlic, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, calamansi, sesame oil and water. Mix well.

Step4: Combine chicken shredded lettuce, onion, jicama, carrot, peanuts and cilantro in a large bowl. Lightly coat with half of the dressing and place on top of every lettuce. Serve immediately with the remaining dressing on the side.

name: Stuffed Tofu with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Using a measuring spoon, scoop out 1 tbsp of the tofu to hollow out each tofu cube. Mash the scooped-out tofu and mix with ground pork, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and five spice powder.
Step2: Form ground pork mixture and stuff inside the tofu. Coat lightly with flour. Fry in preheated oil until golden brown and set aside.

Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in the same pan. Pour water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sesame oil.  Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce
Step4: Add fried stuffed tofu and simmer for 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve.

name: Holiday Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, carrot, ham and shrimp in oil using a large wok. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step2: Add rice and cook for 3mins.
Step3: Make a well in the center of the wok and pour beaten eggs. Cook egg until barely set. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and gently toss with the rice to mix well.
Step4: Stir in corn, crab sticks, lettuce and scallion. Cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Filipino-Style Grilled Beef Steak
instructions: Step1: Season beef with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi.
Step2: Coat the beef with oil and grill over high heat for 2mins per side. Set aside for 5mins to rest.
Step3: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step4: Transfer beef into a serving plate and drizzle garlic butter. Top with parsley and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Pork Asado
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Heat oil in a sauce pan just big enough for the size of the pork. Add pork and sauté until golden brown.
Step2: Add garlic, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar and pepper. Pour just enough water to cover pork. Simmer for 45 minutes. Remove pork and set aside to cool.
Step3: Simmer cooking liquid until slightly thick.
Step4: Cut pork into ¼-inch thick slices and transfer on a serving plate. Pour sauce, top with spring onion and serve.

name: Birthday Noodles
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion in oil using a wok. Pour water and bring to simmer. Add MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and pepper.
Step2: Stir in pansit canton and cook for 3 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate.
Step3: Heat oil in the same wok. Add pork and chicken. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Pour water and simmer.
Step4: Add carrots, cabbage, shrimp, sesame oil and quail egg. Simmer for 2 minutes. Pour on top of the noodles and serve immediately.

name: Korean-Style Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté pork in oil using a large wok until crispy.
Step2: Push pork on the side of the wok. Sauté garlic, onion, carrots and kimchi in the same wok for 1min. Add chili paste and cook for another minute.
Step3: Add rice and corn kernels. Gently fluff and cook for 2mins.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in scallion and sesame oil. Transfer on a serving plate and set aside.
Step5: Preheat the same wok and add oil. Fry eggs and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Place fried egg on top of the fried rice and serve immediately.

name: Pork Ribs with Tausi
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger, siling labuyo, tausi and star anise in the same pan. Pour water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, brown sugar and sesame oil. Add sautéed pork ribs, cover and simmer for 30mins.
Step3: Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with bokchoy.

name: Chicken Galantina
ingredients: 1 package of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Prepare chicken for galantina. Debone leg quarters. Blanch and reserve all chicken bones. Mince boneless leg quarter and set aside. Simmer chicken bones with 2 cups of water and bay leaf to make stock for the sauce.
Step2: Marinate chicken in MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Savor Classic, calamansi and pepper for 10 minutes.
Step3: Meanwhile, season ground chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add onion, carrot, pickle relish and bell peppers. Mix well and keep mixture very cold.
Step4: To assemble, brush aluminum foil with  1 tbsp of oil. Place boneless chicken, stuffed with ground chicken mixture and Chorizo de bilbao in the center. Roll and seal aluminum foil tightly.
Step5: Place in a shallow pan with water and simmer for 30 minutes. Set aside to cool for completely.

Step6: To prepare the sauce, sauté onion and garlic in butter for 5 minutes. Add flour and cook for 2 minutes. Pour chicken stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Strain into a sauce pan and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and parsley.
Step7: Remove chicken from the aluminum foil and sauté using remaining 1 tbsp of oil on all sides. Slice into serving portions, transfer into a serving plate and serve with sauce.

name: Humba
instructions: Step1: Combine pork belly, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaf, peppercorn, sugar, water and tausi in a pot. Simmer while covered for 45 minutes.
Step2: Strain pork and sauté in oil until golden brown.
Step3: Pour cooking liquid, season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and  simmer for another 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Oystar General Tso’s Chicken
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and Chinese rice wine. Coat well with flour and fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.

Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, ginger and dried chilies. Pour Chinese rice wine, rice wine vinegar, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sugar and water. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture and simmer until sauce is thick.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken and cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and top with scallions.

name: Chicken Popcorn
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi.
Step2: Pour beaten eggs to marinated chicken and mix well. Combine flour and cornstarch. Toss chicken in the flour mixture
Step3: Preheat oil. Shake off excess flour and fry over medium high heat until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Sauté garlic in butter in a sauce pan. Add sugar, catsup, MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi and water. Simmer for 1min.
Step5: Transfer freshly cooked chicken on a serving plate and top with scallions. Serve with dipping sauce.

name: Sizzling Bulalo
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef in water with bay leaves and peppercorn for 2 hours. Skim off scum and fat as needed.
Step2: Add onion and garlic and continue to simmer until very tender. Strain and reserve 2 cups of the broth.
Step3: Melt butter in a pan. Add flour and cook for 1min. Gradually stir in reserved broth. Simmer until slightly thick. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor Classic.
Step4: Preheat a clean sizzling plate. Place beef shank. Pour sauce on top. Add corn, green beans and pechay on the side of the beef. Top with toasted garlic and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Salted Egg Spaghetti
ingredients: 1 packet of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, siling labuyo and salted egg yolk in butter. Pour NESTLE® Carnation® Evap, NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and water.  Stir in cheese and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step2: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step3: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce with spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Crispy Pork Adobo
instructions: Step1: Combine pork, 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, vinegar, water, pepper and bay leaves in a pot. Gently simmer uncovered for 45mins or until almost dry. Set aside to cool completely.
Step2: Sauté garlic and siling labuyo in oil until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Fry pork in the same oil until crispy and golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Transfer Crispy Pork on a serving plate. Top with toasted garlic and chilies and serve with tomatoes.

name: Lechon Pansit
instructions: Step1: Sauté lechon in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Pour water and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Stir in noodles, carrot and cabbage. Cover and cook 2mins.
Step3: Mix well and continue to cook for another minute.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve with calamansi.

name: Filipino-Style Paella
instructions: Step1: Gently heat annatto seeds and oil in a pan for 2mins. Set aside to cool. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté bell peppers in 1tbsp of annatto oil. Remove and set aside for topping.
Step3: Season pork and chicken separately with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté separately in 1tbsp annatto oil. Remove and set aside.

Step4: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in remaining 2 tbsp of annatto oil. Add rice and cook for 5mins. Pour water, simmer and season with remaining 2-½ sachets of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in pork, cover and cook over low heat for 20mins.
Step5: Top with sautéed chicken and peppers. Turn of heat and set aside to rest while covered for 15mins. Serve warm with lemon wedges.

name: No Bake Macaroni
ingredients: 1 package of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil. Add tomato sauce, catsup and hotdog. Pour water and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and brown sugar. Set aside.
Step2: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step3: Strain elbow macaroni and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving container.
Step4: Gently heat NESTLE® All Purpose Cream. Pour on top of the macaroni. Grate cheese on top and let it melt with the heat of the pasta and the sauce. Serve immediately.

name: Spicy Crispy Shrimp
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®,pepper and MAGGI® Savor Calamansi. Set aside.
Step2: Mix flour and cornstarch. Toss in shrimp and set aside for 5 minutes. Toss again and shake off excess flour.
Step3: Fry shrimps and siling labuyo in batches in preheated oil for 2 minutes. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step4: Serve Crispy Shrimps with cucumber slices and spiced vinegar.

name: Pork Hamonado
instructions: Step1: Combine pork, pineapple juice, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, bay leaf and syrup from the canned pineapple in a pot. Pour enough water to barely cover the pork. Cover, bring to a simmer and cook for 45 minutes.
Step2: Remove pork and set aside to cool. Reserve cooking liquid.
Step3: Sauté pineapple in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step4: Slice pork ½-inch thick and sauté in the same pan until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and simmer for 5mins.
Step5: Transfer pork and sautéed pineapple on a serving plate. Pour sauce on top, sprinkle spring onion and serve.

name: Grilled Pork Chop
ingredients: 3 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork chops with garlic, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Savor Savor Hot Chili, calamansi juice, brown sugar and pepper. Set aside in the refrigerator overnight.
