Step2: Remove pork from the refrigerator 1hr before grilling. Coat the pork with vegetable oil and grill over medium high heat for  3 – 4mins. per side. Set aside for 10mins to rest.
Step3: Cut into serving pieces, transfer into a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Teriyaki
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in oil. Add mirin, sugar, water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sesame oil. Simmer until slightly thick. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Season chicken with ½ sachet MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat half of the teriyaki sauce. Marinate for 30mins.
Step3: Preheat a clean grill and brush with oil. Grill salmon for 2mins. per side.
Step4: Place chicken on top of rice, pour sauce on top and garnish with spring onion and sesame seeds.

name: Supreme Talong Stir Fry
instructions: Step1: Fry eggplant in preheated oil until light golden brown. Remove and set aside to drain excess oil.
Step2: Remove oil  from the pan leaving 1 tbsp. Sauté pork, garlic, onion, tomato and chili. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step3: Add fried eggplant and cook for another 2 minutes
Step4: Transfer eggplant on a serving plate and pour sauce on top. Top with spring onion and serve.

name: Pansit Miki
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and pork belly in oil.
Step2: Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in noodles and cook for 5mins.
Step3: Stir in carrot and cabbage. Transfer on a serving plate. Top with spring onion and serve with calamansi.

name: Batil Patong
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® for 30mins. Strain and set aside pork to cool completely. Reserve pork broth for soup.
Step2: Preheat oil in wok and fry pork until crunchy and golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion and ground beef over high heat. Pour water and season with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step4: Stir in noodles and cook for 3mins. Add carrots, bean sprouts and cabbage. Cook for another 2mins. Transfer on a serving platter.
Step5: Pour reserved pork broth in the same wok and bring to simmer. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the soup. Beat eggs and stir in the broth. Transfer into a serving bowl.
Step6: Slice crunchy pork and place on top of the noodles. Top with scallions.
Step7: Fry eggs in oil and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Place on top of noodles. Serve with soup.

name: Adobo Meatballs
instructions: Step1: Combine ground pork, onion, garlic, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and 1tbsp of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Mix well and for into 1 ½ tbsp meatballs. Set aside.
Step2: Sauté meatballs in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step3: Add crushed garlic in the same pan and sauté until light golden brown. Pour vinegar. Stir in water and remaining 3tbsp of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Add back sautéed meatballs and bay leaves. Simmer for 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tortang Sibuyas, Kamatis at Hipon
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and scallion and shrimp in oil.  Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour into the pan, stir and cook until barely set.
Step3: Cover with a plate, flip and slide back in the pan to cook the other side of the torta. Cook for 2mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pancit Cabagan
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® while covered for 30mins. Strain and set aside pork to cool completely. Reserve pork broth for noodles.
Step2: Preheat oil in wok and fry pork until crunchy and golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper and liver over high heat. Pour reserve pork broth and season with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step4: Stir in noodles and cook for 3 minutes. Add carrots and pechay tagalog. Cook for another 2 minutes. Transfer on a serving platter.
Step5: Slice crunchy pork and place on top of the noodles. Top with quail eggs and scallions. Serve with calamansi

name: Chicken Feet Adobo with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken feet, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, bay leaves, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, siling labuyo and water.
Step2: Simmer while covered for 1hr. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Sauté chicken feet in oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and continue to simmer until thick. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Picadillo
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic and onion in vegetable oil. Add pork and bell pepper. Sauté for 5mins.
Step2: Add potato and carrot. Cook for another 5mins.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, sugar, bay leaf, tomato sauce and water. Stir and simmer for 10mins. Stir in green peas. Transfer on a serve plate and serve.

name: Embutido-Style Meatballs
ingredients: 1 package of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Combine breadcrumbs, egg and NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and set aside for 2mins.
Step2: Add cream mixture with pork, carrot, pickle relish, raisins, bell peppers and cheese. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Mix well.
Step3: Take 2tbsp of the meat mixture, round into a ball, flatten, place quail egg in the center and wrap tightly with the meat mixture. Repeat until all meatballs are assembled
Step4: Sauté meatballs in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step5: Sauté garlic and onion in the same pan. Pour water and season with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Bring to simmer. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step6: Place back sautéed meatballs and simmer for 5mins while basting with the cooking liquid. Transfer on a serving platter, top spring onion and serve.

name: Seafood Adobo
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, tomato and siling panigang in oil.
Step2: Add vinegar and cook for 1 minute Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Stir in mussels, shrimp and squid. Cook for 2 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Kare-Kareng Bagnet
instructions: Step1: Season pork with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step2: Fry eggplant in the same oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil. (5mins)

Step3: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic and onion in oil in a pot. Add ground rice. Stir in water and bring to simmer. Slowly add annatto water until desired color is achieved. Stir in the ground peanut. Season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Pour sauce into a serving bowl. Cut Bagnet and place on top. Add fried eggplant, blanched pechay and sitaw. Serve with Bagoong.

name: Creamy Chicken Embutido
ingredients: 1 package of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Combine breadcrumbs with NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and beaten eggs.  Add chicken, carrot, pickle relish, cheese and egg. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well.
Step2: Brush 2 pcs of aluminum foil with a little oil. Divide mixture into 2 portions. Flatten the mixture and place egg wedges in a row in the center. Roll tightly into a log.
Step3: Steam for 30mins. Unwrap and sauté in oil until light golden brown. Slice, transfer on a plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Corned Beef Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang With Gabi 25g
instructions: Step1: Simmer onion, tomato and siling panigang in a water for 5 minutes.
Step2: Add, radish, okra and sitaw with 2 minutes intervals.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Add corned beef and simmer.
Step4: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Shrimp and Vegetables Skewer
instructions: Step1: Marinate shrimp, bell pepper, onion and scallion with garlic, MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi for 10mins.
Step2: Skewer shrimp and vegetables alternately in bamboo skewers.
Step3: Coat skewers with oil and grill for 2mins per side. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with lemon wedges and grilled baguette.

name: Grilled Chicken with Tomato and Cheese
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and  MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill. Coat marinated chicken with oil and grill for 2mins.
Step3: Flip chicken pieces. Place few tomato slices per chicken and add grated cheese on top. Grill for another 2mins. Transfer on a plate to rest.
Step4: Transfer on a plate, top with basil and serve.

name: Easy Pork Belly Samgyeopsal
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili, pepper, sesame oil and sugar.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill. Grill for 2mins per side.
Step3: Serve with kimchi, lettuce and gochujang.

name: Pinakbet with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and pork in oil.
Step2: Add bagoong and cook for 2mins. Pour water and add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Bring to a simmer.
Step3: Stir in vegetables, cover and cook for 10 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Grilled Mini Burgers
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili 130ml
instructions: Step1: Season beef with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili. Form into 8 equal patties and set aside.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill and brush with oil. Grill beef patties for 2 minutes. Flip, top with cheese and continue to grill for another 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Step3: Spread butter on burger buns and toast until light golden brown.
Step4: To assemble burger, lightly spread mayonnaise on toasted buns. Place lettuce, tomato and burger patties. Cover with top bun and serve.

name: Korean-Inspired Grilled Squid
instructions: Step1: Marinate squid with MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, gochujang, sugar, and sesame oil. Set aside.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill. Brush the squid with oil and grill over high heat for 2 minutes per side. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Step3: Place lettuce on a serving plate. Cut squid into bite-size pieces and place beside lettuce. Top with scallion and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

name: Pancit Habhab
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and pork and liver in oil.
Step2: Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.  Bring to simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Stir in noodles, carrot, sayote, shrimp and pechay. Cook for another 2mins.
Step4: Transfer a serving plate and serve in banana leaves.

name: Bulgogi-Style Spicy Chicken
ingredients: 3 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
1 tbsp of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, to taste
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili, gochujang, sugar, and sesame oil. Set aside.
Step2: Preheat a clean grill. Brush the chicken with oil and grill over high heat for 3mins per side. Set aside for 10mins.
Step3: Cut chicken into bite-size pieces and transfer on a serving plate. Top with spring onion and sesame seeds. Serve with rice and kimchi.

name: Grilled Tanigue with Eggplant Salad
instructions: Step1: Marinate tanigue in MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, 2 tbsp MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi and pepper. Set aside.
Step2: Grill eggplant until well charred. Place in a bowl, cover and set aside for 5mins. Peel off charred skin. Cut into bite-size pieces and set aside.
Step3: Combine eggplant, with onion, tomato, vinegar, spring onion and 1 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Chilimansi. Set aside.
Step4: Brush the tanigue with oil and grill for 2mins per side. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with eggplant salad.

name: Fried Pork Chop with Mushroom Gravy
instructions: Step1: Season pork chops with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.  Coat well with flour.
Step2: Fry in preheated oil for 2mins per side until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan. Add butter, mushroom and garlic. Sauté for 3mins. Add 1 tbsp of flour and cook for another minute. Stir in water and bring to simmer.
Step4: Season gravy with MAGGI® Savor Classic. Simmer until thick. Pour into a serving bowl and serve with Fried Pork Chop.

name: Chicken with Lime Soda
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Preheat oil and sauté chicken until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and siling labuyo in the same pan for 2 minutes.
Step3: Add lime soda, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and pepper. Place back sautéed chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve.

name: Chicken Pork Adobo
ingredients: 0.5 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken, pork, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, garlic, vinegar, water, peppercorn and bay leaves in a pot. Cover and simmer for 15mins.
Step2: Remove chicken and set aside. Continue to simmer for another 30mins. Strain pork and set aside with the chicken.
Step3: Sauté chicken, pork and garlic in oil until light golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and simmer for another 5mins to reduce sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Supreme Fried Lumpiang Gulay
instructions: Step1: Sauté bean sprouts, carrot and cabbage in oil. Season with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.  Transfer and spread on a tray to cool.

Step2: To assemble, place ½ cup of the vegetable mixture on a lumpia wrapper. Fold the sides and roll tightly into a log. Seal with flour and water mixture. Repeat to assemble 12 pieces of lumpia. (10min)
Step3: To assemble, place ¼ cup of the vegetable mixture on a lumpia wrapper. Fold the sides and roll tightly into a log. Seal with flour and water mixture. Repeat to assemble 12 pieces of lumpia.
Step4: Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Crispy Pata
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork in water for 1 hour. Add bay leaf, pepper and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Simmer until tender. Remove pork and set aside to cool. Reserve broth for other dishes.
Step2: For the Vinegar-Soy dip, combine vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, onion, chili, pepper and sugar in a bowl. Mix well and set aside.
Step3: Deep fry pork in preheated oil until crispy. Set aside to drain excess oil.  Chop, transfer on a serving plate and serve with Vinegar-Soy dip.

name: Tofu Fries with Catsup and Savor Dip
ingredients: 4 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Season tofu with 2tbsp MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili. Fry tofu strips in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step2: Mix remaining 2tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili and catsup. Set aside for dipping.
Step3: Transfer Tokwa Fries on a  serving plate and serve with dipping sauce.

name: Pork Sinigang with Ube
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer pork with water with onion and tomato and ube for 45mins.
Step2: Add siling panigang, radish, okra and sitaw with 2min intervals.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Hotdog Stuffed Meatballs
instructions: Step1: Combine ground pork, onion, garlic, carrot, egg, 2tbsp MAGGI® Savor Classic and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well and for into 2tbsp meatballs. Stuff with hotdog balls and form into balls. Set aside.
Step2: Melt butter in a pan and sauté meatballs until golden brown.
Step3: Add sugar, 1tbsp MAGGI® Savor Classic and water. Mix well to make a glaze.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate. Serve with lettuce, cucumber, tomato and red onion on the side.

name: Adobong Sitaw
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil. (10mins)
Step2: Add vinegar and cook for 2mins.  Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.  Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Stir in sitaw and cook for 5mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Fried Chicken with Gravy
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.  Coat well with flour.
Step2: Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer on a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step3: Remove oil from the pan. Add butter and garlic. Sauté for 1min. Add 1tbsp of flour and cook for another minute. Stir in water and bring to simmer.
Step4: Season gravy with MAGGI® Savor Classic. Simmer until thick. Pour into a serving bowl and serve with Fried Chicken.

name: Paksiw na Pata
instructions: Step1: Sauté saging na saba in 2 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté pork and garlic in remaining oil. Add vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, bay leaf, peppercorn and banana blossom . Pour water to barely cover pork. Simmer until tender.
Step3: Add saba and simmer for another 5 minutes. Season withMAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Bulalo with Gabi
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef with water while covered for 3hrs.
Step2: Add onion and tomato and simmer for 15mins.
Step3: Add siling panigang, radish, okra and sitaw with 2-mins intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Oystar Mixed Vegetables
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and bell pepper in oil.
Step2: Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with pepper.  Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Add young corn, mushroom, broccoli, cauliflower and quail eggs. Gently toss. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Oyster Kangkong with Tofu
instructions: Step1: Fry tofu in preheated oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.

Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Add garlic, onion and ginger in the same pan. Pour MAGGI® 
Oyster Sauce and water. Bring to simmer.

Step3: Cut fried tofu into cubes. Add to simmering sauce. Stir in kangkong and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer 
on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sotanghon Guisado
instructions: Step1: Combine water and chicken breast in a pot. Simmer for 5mins and set aside to cool. Shred chicken and reserve broth.
Step2: Sauté garlic in oil until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté onion in the same pan. Pour prepared chicken broth and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and freshly ground pepper.
Step4: Stir in sotanghon, cover and cook for 5mins. Stir in chicken, ear wood mushroom, carrot and pechay Baguio and continue to cook for another 2mins.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate, top with scallion and toasted garlic. Serve with calamansi.

name: Chicken Adobo with Egg and Oyster Sauce
ingredients: 0.5 kg of chicken leg quarters, cut into pieces
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, soy sauce, garlic, vinegar, water, peppercorn and bay leaves in a pot. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Strain chicken and set aside.
Step2: Sauté chicken and garlic in oil until golden brown.
Step3: Pour cooking liquid and simmer until sauce is thick and coating the chicken. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Watermelon Beef Sinigang with Gabi
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef with water while covered for 2hrs. Skim off the fat.
Step2: Mash 1cup of the watermelon and reserve 1cup in chunks.
Step3: Add onion, tomato and watermelon (both mashed and chunks). Simmer for 15mins.
Step4: Add siling panigang, radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals.
Step5: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Stir Fried Sitaw with Ground Pork
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, to taste
instructions: Step1: Sauté pork, garlic, onion and tomato in oil.
Step2: Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step3: Add sitaw and cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with toasted garlic and serve.

name: Grilled Pork Belly with Oyster Sauce
instructions: Step1: Combine MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, catsup, pepper, sugar and siling labuyo. Mix well and divide into 2 portions. Use one portion for marinating and the other portion for basting.
Step2: Marinate pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and 1 portion of the MAGGI® Oyster Sauce mixture. Refrigerate overnight.

Step3: Remove marinated pork from the refrigerator 1hr before cooking. Preheat a clean grill. Coat pork with oil and grill for 3 – 4 minutes per side. Brush with the reserved portion of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce mixture.
Step4: Transfer on a plate to rest for 10 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve.

name: Supreme Pork Adobo
instructions: Step1: Combine pork, MAGGI Supreme Sarap, garlic, vinegar, water, peppercorn and bay leaf in a pot. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Strain pork and set aside. (50mins)
Step2: Sauté pork and garlic in oil until light golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and simmer until sauce is thick and coating the pork. (10mins)
Step3: Transfer on a serving plate and serve. (1min)

name: Garlic Mushroom
ingredients: 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic in butter until light golden brown. Strain garlic and set aside for topping.
Step2: Sauté mushrooms in the same pan until light golden brown.
Step3: Drizzle MAGGI® Savor Hot Chili. Transfer on a serving plate, top with toasted garlic and parsley. Serve with toasted bread.

name: Pansit Canton
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and pork in oil for 5 minutes.
Step2: Pour water and bring to simmer. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper and cook for 10mins.
Step3: Stir in pansit canton, carrot and cabbage. Cook for 2mins while stirring. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately with calamansi.

name: Lumpiang Sariwa
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, ground pork and tokwa in oil. Add singkamas, carrot and cabbage. Season with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Set aside to cool.

Step2: To prepare the sauce, mix garlic, brown sugar, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, MAGGI® Magic Sarap®,pepper with water in a pot. Simmer and stir in cornstarch mixture to thicken the sauce. Transfer into a serving bowl and set aside.

Step3: To assemble, lay a piece lettuce leaf on top of a lumpia wrapper. Sprinkle 1 ½ tbsp of ground peanuts. Add ½ cup of the vegetable mixture. Fold the sides and roll tightly into a log. Repeat to assemble 6 pieces of lumpia. Serve with the sauce.

name: Pinakbet with Lechon Kawali
instructions: Step1: Season pork belly with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and bagoong in the same pan.
Step3: Pour water and simmer. Add kalabasa, okra, eggplant and sitaw in 2-minute intervals. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Stir in fried pork. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Steamed White Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Add garlic, ginger, white part of scallion, rice wine and sesame oil. Marinate for 30mins.
Step2: Place on the steamer rack and steam for 10 minutes. Set aside to rest.
Step3: Cut chicken into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving plate with cucumber and tomatoes. Garnish with cilantro and green part of scallions. Serve with hoisin and sriracha.

name: BBQ Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and BBQ in oil.
Step2: Add rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Step3: Make a well in the center and pour beaten eggs. Stir and cook until barely set. Stir in with the rice.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Fluff until steaming hot. Stir in carrot, lettuce and spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Kalabasang Ukoy
instructions: Step1: Mix cornstarch, flour, MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, baking powder and the cold water to make a smooth batter.
Step2: Stir in beaten egg and add kalabasa and shrimp.
Step3: Carefully drop 1 large spoonful of the mixture in preheated oil and deep fry until golden brown. Drain excess oil and serve with spiced vinegar.

name: Corned Beef Spaghetti
ingredients: 125 ml of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Cook spaghetti according to package direction.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and corned beef in vegetable oil.

Step3: Pour tomato sauce and catsup. Season with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Add
sugar and Nestle All Purpose Cream. Bring to a gentle simmer.

Step4: Strain spaghetti and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate, grate cheese on top and serve. 

Note: Add other ingredients like sliced hotdog, mushroom or grated carrot.

name: Seafood Sinigang
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté ginger, lemongrass, onion, tomato and siling panigang in oil. Add fish sauce. Pour water and simmer.
Step2: Add radish. Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Add shrimps, mussels and squid. Simmer for another minute.
Step3: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Ham and Keso de Bola Torta
instructions: Step1: Beat eggs and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in cheese.
Step2: Sauté ham in oil for 2 minutes using a non-stick pan. Pour egg mixture in the pan. Gently stir until barely set.
Step3: Cover with plate, flip, and slide back in the pan to cook the other side. Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate, and serve warm.

name: Pork Chops with Pepper and Onion Relish
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® , pepper, thyme, rosemary, garlic and olive oil.
Step2: Sauté peppers and onion in olive oil until caramelized. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, pepper, and sugar. Turn off heat and stir in balsamic vinegar and basil.
Step3: Pan sear pork chops in a sauté pan for 2-3 minutes per side. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes. Slice, transfer on a serving platter with the pepper and onion relish.

name: Corned Beef Burger
ingredients: 0.5 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Mix Nestle All Purpose Cream with mayonnaise, garlic, salt, pepper and spring onion. Set aside.
Step2: Remove outmost layer of onion to get 6 onion rings. Use middle part of the onion to other recipes.
Step3: Cook corned beef on its own in a pan for 5 minutes. Set aside.
Step4: Season eggs with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and add corned beef.
Step5: Pour oil in a wide pan and arrange onion rings in one layer. Pour egg mixture in the middle of the onion rings. Cook for 2 mins per side. Remove and set aside.

Step6: Toast bread in the same pan. Spread Garlic Cream Sauce. Assemble lettuce, tomato and Corned Beef Burger. Serve warm. 

Notes: Other toppings like coleslaw, cheese and cooked bacon strips may be added.

You may cook corned beef with egg torta style if you will not use onion
rings as molds.

name: Restaurant-Style Breaded Potato Chips
ingredients: 0.5 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
0.5 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Combine potato, Nestle All Purpose Cream, MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Set aside.
Step2: Mix flour with garlic powder and paprika. Coat each potato with the flour mixture.
Step3: Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate.

Step4: Mix Nestle All Purpose Cream with mayonnaise, garlic, salt, pepper and spring onion. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve with potatoes.

Note: Best served with Fried chicken or battered fish.

name: Bihon Guisado with Lechong Manok
ingredients: 1 pc of onion, cut into strips
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic and onion in oil. Pour water and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, pepper and brown sugar.
Step2: Drain bihon and stir in the pan. Cover and cook for 5mins.
Step3: Add carrot, cabbage and chicken. Gently stir,  transfer on a serving plate and serve with calamansi.

name: Grilled Gindara With Citrus Salsa
instructions: Step1: Season gindara with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, lemon zest and olive oil. Set aside.

Step2: Combine pomelo, orange and red onion in a bowl. Season with salt, lemon juice, siling labuyo, cilantro, sugar and pepper. Add olive oil, mix and transfer on a serving plate. Refrigerate until serving.
Step3: Preheat a clean grill  over medium high heat. Grill gindara for 2mins per side. Remove and set aside to rest for 5mins. Serve on top of the Citrus Salsa. Serve immediately.

name: Beef Salpicao
instructions: Step1: Marinate beef with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Savor Calamansi, garlic, sugar and pepper for 10 minutes.
Step2: Preheat oil in a large pan and sauté beef until golden brown.
Step3: Add mushrooms and butter and cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Lechon Patatim
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, mushroom, star anise and peppercorn in oil. Pour wine and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step2: Add pork and barely cover with water. Simmer for 15mins
Step3: Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and brown sugar. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate. Pour sauce on top and serve with mushroom and pechay.

name: Korean-style Fried Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Coat with flour and fry until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from the wok leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté, garlic, onion, ginger and red chili. Add soy sauce, water and sugar. Simmer until thick.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken pieces. Transfer on a serving plate. Top with sesame seeds and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Meatball Caldereta
ingredients: 1 pc of Red And Green Chili
0.25 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté potato and carrot in 2 tbsp of oil until golden brown. Set aside.
Step2: Combine ground pork, onion, 2tbsp of cheese and ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well and form into meatballs. Sauté in remaining 2tbsp of oil. Set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, siling labuyo and liver spread in the same pan. Pour tomato sauce and water. Add meatballs, potato, carrot, bay leaf and bell peppers. Simmer for 10mins.

Step4: Stir in 1tbsp of cheese and season with remaining 1 ½ sachets of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and brown sugar. Turn off heat and stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Salted Egg Shrimps
instructions: Step1: Mix flour and cornstarch. Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat shrimps with egg and dredge well with flour mixture.
Step2: Fry in preheated oil. Strain to drain excess oil.
Step3: Remove oil form the pan. Add butter, garlic, sling labuyo and salted egg yolks. Cook for 2mins.
Step4: Add sugar and fried shrimps. Toss until well coated. Transfer on a serving plate, top with spring onion and serve.

name: Spicy Garlic Crab
instructions: Step1: Combine oil and garlic in a pan. Gently fry until light golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Coat crab with cornstarch and sauté in oil. Remove and set aside.

Step3: Sauté ginger, scallions, chili in the same pan. Add back the pieces of crab and toasted garlic. Pour Chinese rice wine. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pinakbet with Lechon
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and bagoong in the same pan. Add lechon and cook for 2mins. Pour water and simmer for 5mins.
Step2: Add kalabasa, okra and sitaw in 2-mins intervals. Add ampalaya, eggplant and lechon and simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chicken Sotanghon Soup
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water. Set aside the chicken and reserve the broth. Shred chicken.
Step2: Combine oil and annatto seeds and heat for 5 minutes. Strain. Sauté garlic and onion in annatto oil.
Step3: Pour  broth and simmer. Season with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, fish sauce and pepper. Add sotanghon and cook for 5 minutes.
Step4: Add carrots, cabbage and chicken. Cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving bowl. Top with toasted garlic and spring onion and serve.

name: Paksiw na Lechon
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, lechon, and bay leaf in oil.
Step2: Pour vinegar, water, and sarsa ng lechon. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and sugar. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Crispy Liempo Chips
ingredients: 2 cups of vegetable oil for frying
instructions: Step1: Mix flour and cornstarch. Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, sugar and pepper. Coat pork well with flour mixture.
Step2: Fry pork in preheated oil until crispy and golden brown. Strain to drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate.
Step3: Mix mango, tomato, onion, garlic, bagoong and spring onion. Serve with Crispy Liempo Chips.

name: Crispy Palabok
instructions: Step1: Sauté shrimp shells in oil. Crush shrimp heads to extract more flavor. Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Season shrimp with ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, sauté in 1 tbsp of oil and set aside.

Step3: Sauté garlic, onion and ground rice in 2 tbsp of oil. Whisk in shrimp stock and annatto water. Season with remaining 1 ¾ sachets of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, fish sauce and pepper. Keep at low simmer.
Step4: Fry noodles in preheated oil. Drain excess oil and transfer on a serving plate.
Step5: Place sautéed shrimp,  tinapa, chicharon, toasted garlic, spring onion and egg around the noodles. Pour Palabok sauce, stir and serve with calamansi.

name: Chicken Liver Adobo
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken liver, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, bay leaf soy sauce, sugar and water. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Step2: Strain and continue to simmer cooking liquid to another 10 minutes.

Step3: Meanwhile, sauté chicken liver in oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid, season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and continue to simmer for another 2 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: All-in-One Ginisang Ampalaya at Sardinas
ingredients: 1 can of Sardines in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and sardines in oil.
Step2: Add ampalaya and sauté for 5 minutes. Stir in beaten egg and cook until barely set.
Step3: Season with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pour water. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Creamy Seafood Soup
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Lightly sauté shrimp shells in 1 tbsp oil. Crush shells to extract flavor. Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and carrot in remaining 2 tbsp of oil. Stir in flour and cook for 2mins. Stir in prepared shrimp stock and simmer. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Add shrimp, squid and crab sticks. Stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and parsley. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Seafood Tinowa
instructions: Step1: Simmer water with ginger, lemongrass, onion, tomato and finger chili for 10 minutes.
Step2: Add shrimp, squid and tanigue. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Stir in malunggay. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Shrimp and Broccoli
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté in 2tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.

Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger and onion in remaining oil. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Add shrimp, mushroom and broccoli. Cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Pinoy Bihon Guisado
ingredients: 2 tbsp of Canola And Corn Oil
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water for 10 minutes. Set aside the chicken and reserve the broth.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in oil. Pour broth, simmer and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper.
Step3: Drain bihon and stir in the broth. Cover and cook for 5 minutes.
Step4: Shred cooked chicken. Stir in chicken and vegetables in the noodles. Transfer on a serving plate and garnish with spring onion.

name: Sinuwam na Mais
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and pork belly in oil in a pot. Add corn and cook for 2 minutes.
Step2: Pour in water and simmer  for 45 minutes or until tender.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in shrimp and chili tops. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: General Tso's Chicken
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, Chinese rice wine and soy sauce set aside. Coat well with flour and fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.

Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic, ginger and dried chili. Pour Chinese rice wine, rice wine vinegar, soy sauce, sugar and water. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture and simmer until sauce is thick.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken and cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate and top with scallions.

name: Pork and Langka Guisado
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, siling panigang, pork and bagoong in oil.
Step2: Add langka and water and simmer for 20mins or until tender.
Step3: Add coconut cream and shrimp. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: All-in-One Pork Chao Fan
instructions: Step1: Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan, pour beaten egg and cook until barely set. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, ground pork and carrot in remaining 1 tbsp of oil. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step3: Add rice and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Pour 2 tbsp of water on the side, add scrambled egg and gently fluff until steaming hot. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Sopas
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken breast in water. Reserve water and shred chicken.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in a pot. Pour reserved broth and simmer. Add macaroni and carrot and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in cabbage. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Fried Matambaka
instructions: Step1: Season matambaka with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry matambaka for 4mins per side. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Fried Chicken Burger
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Coat well with flour and fry in oil until golden brown. Transfer into a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step2: Combine NESTLE® All Purpose Cream, mayonnaise and garlic. Spread on toasted burger buns.
Step3: Assemble burgers with fried chicken, lettuce, tomato and onion. Serve immediately.

name: Pancit Palabok
instructions: Step1: Sauté shrimp shells in oil. Crush shrimp heads to extract more flavor. Pour water and simmer for 10 minutes. Strain and set aside.

Step2: Season shrimp with ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, sauté in oil and set aside. Sauté garlic, onion and ground rice in oil. Whisk in shrimp stock and annatto water. Season with remaining 1 ½ sachets of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, fish sauce and pepper.
Step3: Boil noodles in water. Drain and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate and top with sautéed shrimp,  tinapa, chicharon, toasted garlic, spring onion and egg. Serve with calamansi

name: Beef Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Heat 1tbsp of oil in a wok and pour eggs. Stir and cook until barely set. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté ground beef, garlic and onion. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and  pepper.
Step3: Stir in rice, scrambled egg and bean sprouts. Season with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix in scallions and sesame oil. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Togue Guisado
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add shrimp and togue. Cook over high heat for 1min.
Step3: Pour water and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Goto
instructions: Step1: Simmer tripe in water. Drain and discard liquid. Simmer blanched tripe in water until tender.
Step2: Sauté garlic in oil until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for topping.
Step3: Sauté ginger and onion in garlic oil. Stir in rice and pour water. Add kasubha simmer until rice is soft and thick.
Step4: Cut tripe into bite-size and add to rice. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into servings bowls and top with spring onion, toasted garlic. Serve with calamansi.

name: Sizzling Chili Squid
instructions: Step1: Blanch squid in boiling water and soak quickly in cold water. Drain well and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, chili and chili paste in oil.
Step3: Add blanched squid and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Add spring onion and sesame oil. Transfer on a preheated sizzling plate and serve immediately.

name: Prawns in Salted Egg Butter Sauce
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, siling labuyo and salted egg in butter.
Step2: Add prawns and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Pour water and cook for another minute.
Step3: Add spring onion and cilantro. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sweet Chili Crab
ingredients: 1 kg of Live Female Mud Crab
instructions: Step1: Simmer crabs in a little water to pan steam for 5 minutes. Drain and quickly rinse. Separate the shell and the claws from the body. Remove and discard the gills and apron. Cut the body into 4 serving pieces. Crack the claws.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger and chili paste in butter. Add catsup, sugar and water. Season with sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step3: Add the crabs and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in beaten egg and add scallions. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Ginataang Alimango
ingredients: 1 kg of Live Female Mud Crab
instructions: Step1: Simmer crabs in a little water to pan steam for 5mins. Drain and quickly rinse. Separate the shell and the claws from the body. Remove and discard the gills and apron. Cut the body into 4 serving pieces. Crack the claws.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger and siling panigang in oil. Pour coconut milk and cream  and bring simmer.
Step3: Add crabs and continue to simmer until sauce starts to  thicken. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Beef with Mushroom
instructions: Step1: Season beef with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Sauté in 2 tbsp of oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in remaining oil. Add rice wine, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and sugar.
Step3: Add mushroom, snow peas and sautéed beef. Cook for 1 minute. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Beef and Mushroom Stew
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and beef in oil.
Step2: Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, pepper and sugar. Barely cover with water and simmer until tender.
Step3: Stir in mushroom and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.  Transfer into a serving plate and top with spring onion and toasted garlic.

name: Braised Pork Belly
instructions: Step1: Season pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Heat oil in a pot and sear pork until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, siling labuyo, bay leaves, star anise, peppercorn and mushroom in the same pot. Place pork, pour MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and barely cover with water. Simmer for 2hrs.
Step3: Remove pork and set aside. Simmer cooking liquid until thick and strain.
Step4: Slice pork and transfer into a plate. Pour sauce on top, garnish with mushrooms and scallions and serve.

name: Ginataang Langka
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion pork belly and bagoong in oil.
Step2: Add coconut milk and langka. Simmer for 20 minutes or until sauce is thick and langka is tender.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Pesang Bangus
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and ginger in oil. Pour in rice washing and simmer.
Step2: Add bangus and peppercorn. Simmer for 10 minutes. Skim off the scum. Stir in cabbage, pechay, and scallion.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve

name: Camaron Rebusado
instructions: Step1: Prepare batter by whisking flour, baking powder, egg and iced water to make into pancake batter consistency.
Step2: Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® lightly coat with flour and dip in batter while holding the tail end. Carefully drop in a preheated oil and fry until light golden brown.
Step3: Transfer cooked shrimp into a cooling rack to drain excess oil. Repeat process in batches. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Sinigang na Salmon
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomato and finger chili in oil. Pour water and simmer while covered for 10 minutes.
Step2: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix , fish sauce and sugar. Add salmon and simmer for 2 minutes.
Step4: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Salad
ingredients: 125 ml of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Season chicken breast with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and paprika. Sauté chicken in oil for 2mins. per side. Transfer on a plate to cool. Cut into pieces and set aside.
Step2: Prepare dressing by mixing garlic, mayonnaise, NESTLE® All Purpose Cream, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt, pepper and sugar.
Step3: Lightly coat chicken, cucumber, celery, tomato and lettuce with the dressing. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Pinoy Burger Steak in Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Combine ground beef, ground pork, onion and garlic in a bowl. Season with 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Form into 6 equal patties.
Step2: Sauté burger in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Sauté mushroom in the same pan. Add flour. Stir in water. Season with remaining sachet of 8g MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Add burger and stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate, pour sauce on top and serve.

name: Filipino Chicken Macaroni Salad
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Transfer chicken on plate to cool. Use chicken broth in other recipes. Shred chicken breast and transfer into a large bowl.

Step3: Add cooked pasta, mayonnaise, Nestlé® All Purpose Cream, condensed milk, pineapple tidbits, raisins, cheese and fruit cocktail. Mix well and transfer into a clean container with cover. Refrigerate overnight before serving.

name: Pork Tocino
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pineapple juice, sugar, pepper and catsup overnight in the refrigerator.
Step2: Transfer on a pan. Pour water, cover and simmer until tender. Remove cover and continue to simmer until almost dry.
Step3: Pour oil and sauté pork until golden brown and caramelized. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with garlic fried rice and egg.

name: Ginataang Pinakbet
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, pork belly and bagoong in oil.
Step2: Pour coconut  milk and simmer. Add kalabasa, ampalaya, okra, sitaw and eggplant in 2 minute-intervals.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Spaghetti Pomodoro
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step2: Sauté garlic and tomato in olive oil. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step3: Strain pasta and toss in the sauce with basil. Transfer on a serving plate,  top with parmesan cheese and serve.

name: Beef Curry
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef in water. Add bay leaf and peppercorn and cook until tender. Remove beef and reserve 2 cups of the beef stock.
Step2: Sauté potato and carrot in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, red chili, red and green bell pepper and curry powder in oil. Add beef and pour 2cups of beef stock. Simmer uncovered until very tender.
Step4: Add sautéed potato and carrot and coconut cream. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Transfer on a serving plate and top with cilantro.

name: Italian Style Roast Pork Belly
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork in MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®, pepper, garlic, parsley, thyme and oregano in the refrigerator overnight.
Step2: Place aromatics in the center of the pork and tie into a roll using a butcher’s twine.

Step3: Preheat oven at 350?F. Place pork in a roasting pan with rack. Pour white wine and water. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and roast for 1 hour. Remove aluminum foil and continue to roast until golden brown and skin in crispy. Brush with olive oil.
Step4: Remove from the oven and set aside. Strain drippings into a sauce pan and skim off rendered fat. Simmer until slightly thick.
Step5: Remove butcher’s twine and cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with sauce.

name: Tinapa Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté flaked tinapa,  garlic, onion and tomato in oil.
Step2: Push ingredients on the side and pour beaten eggs. Stir and cook until barely set.
Step3: Add rice and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Pour 2tbsp of water on the side and gently fluff until steaming hot. Stir in spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Fried Labahita
instructions: Step1: Season labahita fillet with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat with flour.
Step2: Preheat oil in large pan and pan fry labahita for 4 minutes per side. Drain excess oil. Transfer on a plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Oxtail
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer oxtail in water until slightly tender. Skim the scum. Strain oxtail and set aside. Reserve stock.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomato and siling panigang. Add tender oxtail and fish sauce. Pour stock and continue to simmer until oxtail is very tender.
Step3: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-min intervals.
Step4: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Oyster Fried Chicken
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Set aside for at least 1hr or up to overnight in the refrigerator.
Step2: Preheat oil and fry chicken for 10 – 12mins. over medium heat until golden brown. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Ginisang Sitaw
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and ground pork in oil.
Step2: Add sitaw and sauté for 1 minute.
Step3: Pour water and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Braised Beef Brisket
instructions: Step1: Season beef  with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Coat with flour and sear in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté onion, carrot and celery in the same pan. Add garlic and tomato paste. Pour wine and simmer.
Step3: Place seared beef and pour water. Add bay leaf and thyme and simmer until tender. Skim off the fat as needed. Add water as needed.
Step4: Remove the beef and set aside. Strain the sauce. Season with remaining sachet MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Slice beef and transfer on a serving plate. Pour sauce and top with parsley.

name: Prawns and Garlic Pasta
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.

Step2: Season prawns with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sauté in olive oil. Remove and sear 
aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, lemon zest and tomato in the same pan. Add lemon juice and butter. Season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Strain pasta and toss in the sauce with basil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Glazed Fried Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Coat with flour and fry until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from the wok leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté, garlic, onion, ginger, siling labuyo and sugar. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Simmer until thick.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken pieces, sesame seeds and spring onion. Transfer into a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Eggs in a Basket
instructions: Step1: Cut out a round shape from each bread slices using a cookie cutter or a glass.
Step2: Lightly butter each bread. Toast one side of the bread in a pan.

Step3: Flip and break an egg in the middle. Season eggs with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Cook for 2 minutes over low heat or until egg is cooked but the yolk is still runny. Transfer into a serving plate, garnish with spring onion and serve.

name: Beef Sinigang with Gabi
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef in water for 1 hour. Add onion, tomato, gabi, finger chili and continue to simmer until tender.
Step2: Mash gabi and stir in the broth to thicken the soup.
Step3: Add eggplant and sitaw and simmer for 2 minutes. Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi and fish sauce.
Step4: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Sinigang na Sugpo sa Gata
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer onion, tomatoes, finger chili, lemongrass and gabi in water for 15 minutes.
Step2: Add prawns and coconut cream and simmer for 1 minute.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Tokwa with Kinchay
instructions: Step1: Fry tokwa in oil until golden brown. Remove and diced.
Step2: Remove oil and sauté garlic, onion and tomato in the same pan.
Step3: Add tokwa and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate , garnish with kinchay and serve.

name: Easy Bacon and Onion Tartlets
ingredients: 1 packet of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Lightly brush flattened bread with butter. Mold into muffin pans and toast for 2mins. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté bacon until crispy. Add onion in the same pan and sauté until golden brown. Set aside to cool.
Step3: Beat eggs with NESTLE® All Purpose Cream, Nestlé® Carnation Evap, bacon and onion, cheese, nutmeg and parsley in a bowl. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step4: Pour into muffin pan lined with bread and bake in the toaster until barely set or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Set aside to rest .Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Ginisang Repolyo
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic and onion in oil.
Step2: Add cabbage and cook for 2 minutes.
Step3: Pour in water, simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve

name: Roast Pork
ingredients: 2 tbls of Maggi® Soy Cooking And Seasoning Sauce
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with 2 tbsp of MAGGI Oyster Sauce, soy souce and calamansi juice overnight in the refrigerator.
Step2: Remove pork from refrigerator 1 hour before roasting. Roll and tie the pork using butcher’s twine. Roast in 375°F preheated oven for 2 hours. Remove from the oven and set aside.
Step3: Combine cream of mushroom soup and water in a pot. Bring to simmer and stir in remaining 2 tbsp of MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and parsley. Transfer into a serving bowl.
Step4: Cut pork into serving pieces, transfer into a serving plate and serve with sauce.

name: Corned Beef White Pizza
ingredients: 125 ml of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Cook corned beef on its own in a pan for 5 minutes. Set aside.
Step2: Mix Nestle All Purpose Cream, garlic, MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and pepper.
Step3: Spread cream sauce on each slice of white bread. Grate cheese on top. Top with cooked corned beef and onion.

Step4: Bake until cheese has melted. Top with spring onion and toasted garlic.

Note: Use other toppings like ham, bacon, sausages, mushrooms, bell peppers and tomato.

name: Korean-Inspired 2-Way Fried Chicken
ingredients: 1 kg of Chicken Thigh And Leg
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI MAGIC SARAP® and pepper.
Step2: Mix remaining ½ cup of flour with ice cold water and 1 tsp of MAGGI MAGIC SARAP®. Add seasoned chicken and coat well.
Step3: Coat battered chicken with remaining flour. Fry in preheated oil until light golden brown. Strain and set aside for 10 minutes.
Step4: Clean the oil using a fine strainer and preheat again over medium high heat. Fry chicken again for 1 - 2 minutes. Transfer in a cooling rack to drain excess oil.
Step5: Transfer half of the fried chicken on a serving plate and serve with lemon wedges.
Step6: Remove oil from the pan leaving 1 tbsp. Sauté garlic and ginger. Add sugar, water, MAGGI Oyster Sauce and catsup. Simmer until thick.

Step7: Toss in half portion of the fried chicken and cook until well coated. Serve with the rest of the fried chicken.

Note: Best serve with Cheesy Potato Balls

name: Tanigue Bistek
instructions: Step1: Fry potato in preheated oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté onion in the same oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Season tanigue with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and coat well with flour. Fry in the same oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.

Step4: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2 tbsp. Sauté garlic until light golden brown. Pour water and simmer. Add MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, calamansi juice, sugar and pepper. Add back fried tanigue and potato and simmer for 2 minutes.
Step5: Transfer on a serving plate, top with sautéed onion, spring onion and toasted garlic. Serve immediately.

name: Steamed Shrimp and Vegetables
instructions: Step1: Toss shrimp, broccoli, cauliflower, and carrot in olive oil.
Step2: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper and dry Italian herb blend.
Step3: Steam for 10mins. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Chinese-Style Crab and Vegetable Soup
instructions: Step1: Combine water, cream-style corn, carrot and crab in a pot. Bring to a boil.
Step2: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken soup.
Step3: Stir in beaten egg, spring onion and sesame oil. Transfer on a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Munggo with Hamon
instructions: Step1: Simmer munggo in water while covered until tender.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, and ham in oil. Add to simmering munggo.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in chili tops. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Diniskartehang Sinabawang Gulay
instructions: Step1: Combine water, ginger, lemongrass and kalabasa in a pot. Bring to a simmer.
Step2: Add okra, eggplant and simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add patola, galunggong, onion, spring onion, malunggay and saluyot. Simmer and season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Kid-Friendly Sinabawang Gulay
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, carrot and mushroom in oil.
Step2: Pour water and bring to simmer. Add corn kernels.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken soup.
Step4: Add shrimps, quail eggs and spring onion. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Beef Kofta With Creamy Tzatziki
ingredients: 1 package of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Season ground beef with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, coriander, cumin, cinnamon, cayenne, garlic, onion, parsley and lemon zest. Mix well and form into sausages. Coat with olive oil and set aside.
Step2: Meanwhile, mix Nestlé All Purpose Cream, cucumber, garlic, salt, pepper, mint and lemon juice. Set aside.
Step3: Grill or sauté Kofta for 2 – 3 mins. Serve with flat bread, Taztziki, lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes and red onion.

name: Chicken Feet Adobo
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken feet, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, bay leaf soy sauce, sugar, siling labuyo and water.
Step2: Simmer while covered for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Sauté chicken feet in oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid, season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Creamy Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté onion and garlic in oil. Add pumpkin and cook for 10 minutes. Pour water and simmer while covered for 10 minutes.
Step2: Transfer into a blender and purée until smooth. Pour back into the same pot.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Temper NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream and pour back to the soup. Bring to a gentle simmer. Pour into serving bowls and top with parsley.

name: Sopas with Lechong Manok
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream 125ml
instructions: Step1: Shred chicken and reserve chicken bones.
Step2: Simmer chicken bones in water for 10mins. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic and onion in a pot. Pour reserved broth and simmer. Add macaroni and carrot and simmer for 10mins.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Temper NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and pour back to the soup. Stir in shredded chicken and cabbage. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Cajun-Style Shrimp
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Sauté shrimps in batches in 2tbsp of olive oil. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Heat remaining 1tbsp of olive oil in the same pan. Sauté onion, garlic, bell peppers and corn kernels. Cook for 2mins.
Step3: Add back sautéed shrimp and season with Cajun spice. Cook for another minute. Stir in parsley.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and serve with lemon wedges.

name: Lemon Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Mix in egg, flour and cornstarch.
Step2: Fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step3: Simmer water and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® Pour lemon juice, honey, sesame oil and cornstarch mixture. Simmer until thick.
Step4: Toss in cooked chicken and cook for another minute. Transfer on a serving plate, top with sesame seeds and scallions. Serve immediately.

name: Adobong Manok sa Gata
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, soy sauce and water in a pot. Simmer for 10 minutes over low heat.
Step2: Strain chicken and sauté in oil until golden brown. Pour cooking liquid and coconut cream in the same pan and simmer for another 10 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Binagoongang Lechon
ingredients: 1 package of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Fry eggplant in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, siling panigang and bagoong. Pour vinegar. Add lechon and cook for 5 minutes.
Step3: Pour water, simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar.
Step4: Stir in NESTLE® All Purpose Cream and simmer for 2 minutes.  Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Lumpiang Gulay with Lechon
instructions: Step1: Sauté lechon in oil until golden brown. Add carrot, togue and cabbage. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and transfer on a large plate to cool.
Step2: Wrap 3 tbsp of vegetable mixture with lumpia wrappers.
Step3: Fry in oil until golden brown. Serve with sarsa ng lechon.

name: Shrimp Pasta
instructions: Step1: Boil pasta according to package direction.
Step2: Melt butter in the same pan. Add garlic, onion and chili flakes. Pour ½ cup of pasta water and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Melt butter in the same pan. Add garlic, onion, and chili flakes. Pour ½ cup of pasta water and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.
Step4: Strain linguine and add to the pan. Toss in shrimp and parsley. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with lemon wedges.

name: Bangus Sisig
instructions: Step1: Season bangus with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Coat with 2 tbsp of oil and grill until golden brown. Set aside to cool. Flake and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic and chili in 1 tbsp of oil. Add bangus flaked and MAGGI® Savor Classic. Transfer into a bowl.
Step3: Add onion and mayonnaise. Serve on a hot sizzling plate. Top with toasted garlic, spring onion and calamansi.

name: Pork Teriyaki
instructions: Step1: Marinate pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, soy sauce, mirin, sugar, pepper, ginger, garlic and sesame oil. Refrigerate overnight.
Step2: Remove from the refrigerator 1hr before cooking. Preheat a clean grill and brush with a little oil.
Step3: Grill pork until golden brown. Transfer on a serving plate. Top with spring onion and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

name: Lechon Fried Rice
instructions: Step1: Sauté lechon in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and carrot in the same oil. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Step3: Make a well in the center and pour beaten eggs. Stir and cook until barely set. Stir in with the rice.
Step4: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and add left over lechon sauce. Fluff until steaming hot. Stir in spring onion. Transfer on a serving plate top with lechon and serve.

name: Fried Chicken 2-ways (Sweet Chili Sauce)
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Coat well with flour. Pan fry in preheated oil until golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 2tbsp. Sauté garlic and pour sweet chili sauce and water. Simmer until thick.
Step3: Toss in fried chicken pieces. Transfer on a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Savorventure Tuna and Tokwa Sisig
instructions: Step1: Fry tokwa in oil until light golden brown. Set aside to drain excess oil. Cut into cubes.
Step2: Heat reserved tuna oil and sauté garlic, tuna and tokwa. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a bowl.
Step3: Add onion and mayonnaise. Serve into a hot sizzling plate. Top with toasted garlic, spring onion and calamansi. Drizzle MAGGI® Savor Calamansi according to taste just before serving.

name: Ginisang Sardinas, Miswa at Pechay
ingredients: 1 can of Fish, sardine, Atlantic, canned in oil, drained solids with bone
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and sardines in oil. Pour water and simmer.
Step2: Stir in miswa. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper.
Step3: Add pechay. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Easy Chicken Embutido
ingredients: 1 pc of egg, medium boiled, halved
2 tbsp of vegetable oil for frying
instructions: Step1: Mix breadcrumbs with NESTLE® Carnation® Evap and water.  Add chicken, carrot, pickle relish and egg. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well.
Step2: Brush aluminum foil with a little oil. Flatten the mixture and place egg wedges in a row in the center. Roll tightly into a log.
Step3: Steam for 30 minutes. Unwrap and sauté until light golden brown. Slice, transfer  on a plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Sinuwam na Tahong
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion and finger chili in oil.
Step2: Add mussels, stir and cover. Cook for 2 minutes.
Step3: Pour water, simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in chili leaves and serve.

name: Easy Chicken Sopas
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken breast in water. Reserve broth and shred chicken.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in a pot. Pour reserved broth and simmer. Add macaroni and carrot and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Stir in cabbage. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Creamy Burger Patty
ingredients: 0.25 cup of NESTLÉ® All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Fry patties in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and mushroom in the same pan. Add flour and cook for another minute. Stir in water and bring to simmer. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®.
Step3: Add burger into the pan and simmer for 2 minutes. Stir in Nestlé® All Purpose Cream and parsley. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Tortang Talong with Giniling
instructions: Step1: Pierce the eggplant with a fork and roast over open flame until skin is charred. Place in a bowl and cover. Set aside for 10mins. Peel the charred skin and flatten with a fork.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, pork in oil. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and set aside.
Step3: Beat 1 egg, add 3 tbsp of meat mixture and place on top of the eggplant. Fry for 2 minutes per side.
Step4: Drain excess oil. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: All-in-One Sinabawang Gulay
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato and pork in oil. Pour water and simmer.
Step2: Add kalabasa, okra and sitaw in 2-minute intervals.
Step3: Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in malunggay leaves. Transfer on a serving bowl and serve.

name: Sweet and Sour Squidballs
instructions: Step1: Sauté squidballs in oil until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, carrot and bell pepper in the same pan. Add vinegar, water, sugar and catsup. Season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step3: Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce. Add meatballs and simmer. Transfer on a serving plate and serve.

name: Sinigang na Lechon with Gabi
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer onion, tomato, lemongrass, finger chili in water.
Step2: Add radish, okra and sitaw with 2-minute intervals.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang with Gabi, fish sauce and sugar. Add lechon and simmer.
Step4: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Lumpiang Shanghai with Galunggong
instructions: Step1: Fry galunggong in oil until golden brown. Set aside to cool.
Step2: Shred fish and mix with onion, carrot and egg. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and mix well.
Step3: Wrap 2 tbsp of the mixture with lumpia wrapper. Fry in oil until golden brown and serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Steamed Fish and Tofu
instructions: Step1: Season fish with ¾ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Place on top of tofu slices and wrap with cabbage leaves. Steam for 10 – 12mins.

Step2: Sauté garlic and ginger in oil. Pour water. Add remaining ¼ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce, sesame oil and pepper. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Transfer steamed fish and tofu on a serving plate, pour sauce on top and serve.

name: Tortang Talong Patties
instructions: Step1: Pierce eggplant with a fork and roast over open flame until charred. Set aside in a bowl and cover. Once cooled, peel off charred skin and coarsely chop.
Step2: Combine roasted eggplant, ground pork, onion, garlic and egg. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Mix well and for into 6 equal patties.
Step3: Pan fry patties in oil until golden brown. Transfer on a plate and place cheese on top.
Step4: Toast pan de sal and assemble with patties. Serve immediately.

name: Beef Papaitan
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef papaitan mix in water until tender.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, ginger and finger chili in oil. Add to simmering soup.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix. Season with fish sauce, brown sugar, pepper and calamansi juice. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve.

name: Vegetable Frittata
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, onion and tomato in olive oil. Add broccoli and mushroom. Season with 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®
Step2: Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.Pour egg in the pan and add cheese and parsley. Gently stir until barely set.
Step3: Cover with plate, flip and slide back in the pan to cook the other side. Remove from the pan and set aside. Cut into serving pieces, transfer on a serving plate and serve warm.?

name: Pancit Langlang
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water for 5mins. Set aside to cool. Reserve chicken broth. Shred chicken.
Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and ground pork in oil.  Pour reserved broth and add MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce.
Step3: Stir in noodles, Cover and cook for 5mins. Add green beans, carrot, cabbage and chicken. Cover and continue to cook for another 3mins.
Step4: Transfer on a serving plate and top with chicharon and spring onion. Serve immediately.

name: Shrimp Tom Yum-Style
ingredients: 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Sampalok With Gabi Mix
instructions: Step1: Sauté shrimp heads in oil. Crush heads to extract more of its flavor. Pour water and simmer for 10mins. Strain broth into another pot. Bring to a boil.
Step2: Add chili paste, lemongrass, ginger, lime peels and siling panigang. Simmer for 10mins.
Step3: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix and season with fish sauce and sugar.
Step4: Add mushrooms, shrimp and coconut cream and simmer for 1min. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve with cilantro and lime wedges.

name: Pasta Caldereta
instructions: Step1: Simmer beef in water with peppercorn and bay leaf until very tender. Strain and reserve 4 cups of beef stock. Shred beef and set aside.

Step2: Sauté garlic, onion, siling labuyo, carrot and bell peppers in oil. Add tomato paste and liver spread. Stir in reserved stock and simmer. Add shredded beef and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and sugar. Simmer until thick. Pour coconut cream.
Step3: Boil pasta according to package direction. Strain pasta and toss in the sauce. Transfer on a serving plate, top with cheese and serve.

name: Pumpkin and Sweet Potato Soup
ingredients: 0.25 cup of 125ml NESTLÉ All Purpose Cream
instructions: Step1: Sauté shallots, pumpkin and sweet potato in olive oil. Add ground coriander and nutmeg.
Step2: Pour water and simmer until very tender. Transfer into a blender and purée until smooth. Simmer and season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper.
Step3: Transfer into serving bowls and garnish with sunflower seeds, cilantro and NESTLE® All Purpose Cream.

name: Sinigang na Bangus sa Sampalok at Bayabas
ingredients: 1 package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
instructions: Step1: Simmer ginger, onion, tomato, siling panigang and guava in water.
Step2: Pour MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampaloc Mix and fish sauce. Add bangus and simmer for 5mins.
Step3: Stir in kangkong. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Bihon Guisado
instructions: Step1: Simmer chicken in water with MAGGI® Magic Sarap® for 5 minutes. Flake chicken and reserve broth.
Step2: Sauté garlic and onion in oil. Add broth, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and pepper. Stir in bihon and cook for 5 minutes.
Step3: Add flaked chicken, carrot, green beans and cabbage. Cook for another 2 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate and garnish with spring onion and toasted garlic.

name: Beef Pancit Canton Guisado
instructions: Step1: Season beef with ½ sachet MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Sauté in oil for 1min and set aside.

Step2: Sauté garlic, onion and bell pepper, in the same pan. Pour water, MAGGI® Oyster Sauce and remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Stir in noodles, carrot and snow peas. Cover and cook for 5mins.
Step3: Add sesame oil. Transfer into a serving plate and serve immediately.

name: Stir Fried Squid
instructions: Step1: Boil salted water and add squid. Cook for 30 seconds. Strain and soak in cold water. Drain well and set aside.
Step2: Sauté garlic, ginger, siling labuyo, onion and bell peppers in oil. Pour water and MAGGI® Oyster Sauce. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken the sauce.
Step3: Add blanched squid and cook for another minute. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Rellenong Bangus
ingredients: 1 tbsp of Maggi® Soy Cooking And Seasoning Sauce
instructions: Step1: Marinate bangus skin with MAGGI Soy, calamansi juice and pepper.?
Step2: Simmer bangus meat and drain. Pick the bones, flake and set aside.
Step3: Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, pork, peas and bangus. Season with MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP® and pepper. Transfer into a bowl. Add raisins and egg. Spoon mixture into the skin.
Step4: Preheat oil and panfry bangus for 4 minutes per side. Cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving platter. Serve with preferred dipping sauce.

name: Bulanglang
instructions: Step1: Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, tomato and bagoong in oil in a pot.
Step2: Add water, kalabasa, kamote, eggplant, amapalaya, okra and sitaw. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Step3: Stir in bangus and malunggay. Season with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. Transfer into a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Saucy Chicken Adobo
instructions: Step1: Combine chicken, garlic, peppercorn, vinegar, MAGGI Oyster Sauce, MAGGI soy sauce and water in a pot. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Step2: Heat oil in a separate pan, strain chicken and sauté until golden brown.
Step3: Pour cooking liquid and simmer for 5 minutes. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Buttered Shrimp with Garlic
instructions: Step1: Season shrimp with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®.
Step2: Sauté shrimp in 2 tbsp of butter over high heat for 1 minute. Remove and set aside.
Step3: Melt remaining butter in the same pan and sauté garlic. Add sugar, catsup and sautéed shrimp. Transfer on a serving plate and garnish with spring onion.

name: Italian-style Roast Pork Belly
instructions: Step1: Marinate flesh side of pork with MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, garlic, parsley, thyme, oregano and olive oil. Refrigerate overnight.
Step2: Remove pork from the refrigerator 1hr before cooking. Tie into a roll using a butcher’s twine. Rub the pork skin with salt.
Step3: Place pork in a roasting pan with rack. Roast in a 350?F preheated oven for 1hr 30mins or until  golden brown and skin in crispy.
Step4: Remove from the oven and set aside to rest. Remove butcher’s twine and cut into serving pieces. Transfer on a serving plate, drizzle pan drippings and serve with lemon.

name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
instructions: Step1: Season chicken with 1 sachet of MAGGI® MAGIC SARAP®. Coat well with flour and fry in oil until golden brown. Strain and set aside.
Step2: Remove oil from the pan leaving 1 tbsp and sauté red onion, pineapple chunks, red and green bell pepper. Remove and set aside.

Step3: Sauté garlic in the same pan. Add vinegar, sugar, water and banana catsup. Simmer and season with remaining 1 sachet of MAGGI MAGIC Chicken®. Stir in cornstarch and water mixture to thicken sauce.
Step4: Toss in chicken and sautéed onion, pineapple and bell peppers. Transfer into a serving plate and serve.

name: Roasted Chicken
instructions: Step1: Marinate chicken with 2 sachets MAGGI® Magic Sarap®, pepper, thyme, rosemary and olive oil. Refrigerate overnight.
Step2: Remove chicken 1hr before cooking. Truss using a butcher’s twine and place in a roasting pan with rack. Roast in a preheated oven for 30mins.

Step3: Remove chicken from the pan. Add potato, carrot, garlic, and shallots. Season with 1 sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap® and pepper. Coat with the drippings. Place back the rack with the chicken and immediately return to the oven and continue to roast for 45mins.
Step4: Remove from the oven and set aside to rest. Cut the chicken into serving pieces. Drizzle drippings on the chicken. Serve with roasted vegetables and lemon wedges.

name: Kinilaw na Inihaw na Pusit
ingredients: 1 Package of MAGGI® Magic Sinigang Original Sampalok Mix
2 tbls of Maggi® Soy Cooking And Seasoning Sauce
instructions: Step1: Marinate squid in MAGGI® MAGIC SIIGANG® Original Sampaloc Mix, soy souce and pepper. Set aside for at least 2 hours.
